Reviews.Title: Multi-function Tablet at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Shoof "trice di cinema"
Reviews.Content: My wife has a Google Nexus 7 tablet and the latter is my only frame of reference for functionality and quality.I purchased (3) Zeepads for my grandchildren and they arrived 12/22/12 instead of the scheduled 12/21.  All were about 85% charged.  Each Zeepad connected to my wi-fi home network in a matter of seconds.  Touch screen was responsive and a breeze to navigate.  I am pleasantly surprised with the overall build quality and remarkable functionality of the Zeepad.While not as fast as the Google Nexus 7, which has a hotter Arm Holdings designed processor, the Zeepad's speed is quite adequate.  I was drawn to the Zeepad since its processor is also an Arm design and the Android operating system is tough to beat.  Image or screen quality is inferior to the Nexus but decent.  The difference can be noticed when viewing the screen from an angle, but as long as the view of the Zeepad is straight on, the quality is good, not great.  To put the review in perspective, remember the Zeepad is well below $100 and, at this price point, I think this product is a real value.  Actually, it is a remarkable surprise.  My grandkids opened these on Xmas Eve and within seconds were connected to the net and gazing at more apps (mostly free games) on GooglePlay, where android apps are offered in abundance.  Did not experience any slowness as mentioned in some reviews.  Perhaps the network? Durability is an unknown since we have had the Zeepads for just few days so I'll follow up in a month or so.  While I was very skeptical that a tablet would do all the things claimed, after seeing the Zeepad in action, I wish I would have grabbed one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet! see review to get some tips on it.
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I recently received my tablet yesterday, it worked right out of the box it was somewhat charged. Note: You should charge it as soon as you get it because it takes 6hrs to charge the first 2 times, this is stated in the manual. Also, be careful with the wall charger, mine needed to be adjusted before it could begin charging the tablet. If you charge by USB it might take longer, i found that the wall charger is quicker. YOU SHOULD BUY MEMORY EXPANSION, it's not optional if you plan on adding a lot of items on your tablet you get 1 GB of on-board storage. Make sure you are careful not to drop it, i would not recommend that at all because it doesn't seem like it is able to take much damage. Personally i bought a tablet case with a keyboard a good 1 to use is the 7" Tablet Stand with USB Keyboard - Black Faux Leather Carrying Case, there is a converter that comes with this tablet that you can hook up to the cases keyboard USB cable. The browsing speed is quite nice and the apps are amazing since they come from the Google play-store. You can stream any type of online content like from YouTube or the web. One thing i found odd is that when your on the main screen and you click the search magnifying glass you see a brief image of previous YouTube videos that you've watched. In my opinion i suggest you uninstall the YouTube app that comes with the tablet and re-install a newer one which fixed my problem. Tip: If you put a SD card in and you want to get it out you push the SD card in and then release it and it will come out. If you decide you want to link a YouTube account with your tablet, and each time you try to login you get an error message. You might need to do the 2-step verification for the Google account you want to link with(additional help just ask). This is an overall good product. If you have any question feel free to ask.

Reviews.Title: S Far So Good!
Reviews.Author: Tashagaqt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tab for my mother as a Xmas gift. She is not tech savy at all so I didnt want to spend much on all the bells and whistles. Also knowing she would mainly use it for pictures, music, and to play solitaire. That being said, I LOVE THIS TAB!!! It was soooo much better than I expected. I dont even think I realized it had so many features. Since showing my sister, she wants one for herself! 7" Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB RAM, Multiple Touch Capactive screen, WIFI, Camera, Skype Video Calling, Netflix Movies. Sure its not as fast as an iPad, 0_o I also didnt pay $500 for it. But it does everything I need it to do plus more.(Netflix,Skype,eBooks,& PlayStore) The volume isnt much without headphones but so far the screen is responsive and had no problems connecting to wifi. I will try and remember to do another review once she's experienced it.

Reviews.Title: Yes, I would recommend this!
Reviews.Author: Renee McClellan
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get my son a mini tablet so he could play games instead of always using my phone but didn't want to spend alot of money, considering he's only 8. He can skype my sister in AZ., he listens to music on Youtube and sends emails to EVEYONE. I ordered it right before Christmas and got a great deal. I am ordering another for my 4 y.o. I would recommend this product. You get the ear buds, a pen, etc. It keeps my guys busy and my phone free. Yes, buy this!

Reviews.Title: Interesting little product
Reviews.Author: D. Flowers
Reviews.Content: We had experience with the kindle fire and kinda knew what to expect.  We had a young person who wanted one of these.  I did not want to buy a kindle and have it linked to my account, also the receiver did not have an Amazon account, so I went for the generic android pad.It is actually built much better than expected, for the price.  I was pleasantly surprised!  We wanted one that could access the play store, and not a limited, proprietary app store.  This met the ticket.Forget about the instructions. They are nearly useless, but it is and android operating system, and nothing that you cannot figure out, if you've ever used an android device.  One pointer, is to fully charge it before first use, it will keep you from thinking that it arrived dead.;)  I thought we had a DOA until charging it overnight, and ta da, it worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great 7in Tablet for Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Ladybug Picnic
Reviews.Content: Zeepad 7 inch Tablet in BlackI purchased 2 on 12/14/12 for my niece (8 yrs) and nephew (10 yrs) - pink and black - $70 each. I had issues with the seller also - left feedback on them specifically, not on the product review.Arrived new with screen protector, USB adapter, charger, pen stylet, and ear buds.  Everything is as described above. It has the many apps already installed, so it is ready to use after charging. Also has Google Play installed. Easy access to all the games, apps, books, etc. It was very sensitive to WiFi. No issues with getting a signal and keeping it connected.It is the best $70 for a tablet computer. My husband is thinking of the 9 in model. I would recommend getting a case/cover and an 8 or 16 GB micro SD for additional memory. ***Remember this tablet is not specific for any age of user. If you give it to a minor/child, please adjust the internet settings, etc or monitor the device appropriately. And please discuss internet and email safety with those children.I would definately recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for Great Price and PINK too!
Reviews.Author: Ladybug Picnic
Reviews.Content: Zeepad 7 inch Tablet in PINKI purchased 2 on 12/14/12 for my niece (8 yrs) and nephew (10 yrs) - pink and black - $70 each. Reviews.Title: For under $100 bucks...you can't beat it...
Reviews.Author: Ashton T. S.
Reviews.Content: I'm a certified computer, phone, and tablet technician. I have extensive experience with tablets. I've used the cheap Koby's, NextBook, etc. I've also had my hands on more expensive tablets, iPad, Nexus, Acer, etc. Let me tell you...this tablet is much more than I expected for the price. It's very fluid. The camera is adequate for skype. The build quality is great. Has a nice solid feel to it. It can accept external storage (USB Thumb Drive or External USB Hard Drive), via the USB female breakout cable.Purchase a microSD card! I cannot stress this enough. Even though they state that it's 4gb, there is only approximately 1gb of usable space. MicroSD cards are cheap these days. I purchased a 16gb for around 15 bucks on here.The screen viewing angle is not that great. But again...under $100 bucks. Also, the resolution is a little rough. It's 800x400, but I have seen 800x400 tablets look much better. Still...it's adequate. I can make out text and pictures clearly.I could've paid a little more and I would still be happy. Very good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: I love my Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: Micky08
Reviews.Content: I really like my Zeepad tablet. For the price I got it for, I think it was really worth it. It does most of everything I was looking for. I received the shipment much earlier/quicker than I had expected. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good beginner Tablet
Reviews.Author: Laticia Hall
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 60 year old father. He's not very technical but it was easy for him to use.

Reviews.Title: Didnt last long
Reviews.Author: odine ogo
Reviews.Content: Battery lasted less than an hour each charge and eventually didnt turn on at all. Took it to see if I could get it fixed, but the guy said that the battery was blown because it was made with  "low grade" components.

Reviews.Title: RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!! DO NOT ATTEMPT TO PURCHASE OR USE THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I actually just needed an electronic, portable calendar so I found this little tablet. After several weeks, the package finally arrived. Trust me, I am not a picky person, I just like something functional but this not only will NOT connect to my wireless router but there is NO support whatsoever so basically I'm screwed. I sent a message to the seller and got some crazy response that made no sense whatsoever. There is no website, help desk, NOTHING. Unbelievable. I will fight through Visa and BBB to get a full refund but trust it will be a battle.UPDATE # 2: AFTER LESS THAN 1 WEEK, THE TABLET WOULD NOT CHARGE. THIS SELLER'S RETURN POLICY INDICATES THAT DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS ARE NOT THEIR FAULT AND BUYERS MUST PAY RETURN SHIPPING TO CHINA. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER, YOU HAVE NO RECOURSE!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: donna smalls
Reviews.Content: I brought this tablet for my kids. Easy to operate and I would recomend this inexspensive tablet. very thin and easy to damage,get a tablet case if giving it to the kids.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Kids!
Reviews.Author: acollis
Reviews.Content: We bought these for our small children for christmas and they are great! They come with all the accessories and a wall charger. My kids can navigate them well, and I find myself stealing them for my own use!

Reviews.Title: Awsome product for the price
Reviews.Author: jessica copley
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for a 5 and 7 year old for christmas. When I recieved them I set them up and it took me no time to start to download apps on them and to start to customize them. Now are they the best quality no not really, but for the money they are awsome. I work with electronics daily for my job. My opinion I would not buy these for my self as an adult, but for a child as a starter it exactly what I wanted for them. It does have the play store which is the most important thing for easy set up and downloading of applications.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Clayton M Larson
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great. It is just as powerful as the big name brand. It has smooth touch screen and the google play store, so to download thousands of free paid apps.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: MarineMom
Reviews.Content: This product is great....Bought it for my 7 year old and installed parental apps....She loves it and so do I.  It's a great tablet for the price....

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: henrietta
Reviews.Content: the camera is only for skype. Not to take other people pictures! Other than that, it's ok. I'm keeping it and also getting the one that has a real camera on it!

Reviews.Title: Works great. Fast Shipping!
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: No problems. Shipping was fast. Works great! It was a gift for my 5 year old and he loves it! He plays his game apps and watches youtube videos on it. Great deal! Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the kids
Reviews.Author: shanab
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter for xmas an she loves it she kills the batt daily its a great buy

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: aksum
Reviews.Content: I just got it an hour ago, everything is ok and works great but the keyboard lags  a little bit but overall it is fantastic for the price

Reviews.Title: Great tablets for the price!
Reviews.Author: KLAMB1978
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting much when I originally ordered.  I bought two for my daughters (6, 7) for Christmas.  I opened them upon receipt and charged.  I was impressed to find Netflix, YouTube and Google Play Store already loaded and ready for use.  The set up is easy including Wi-Fi connection.  I ordered two "better" tablets for my teens(both 15) and think they might not be as happy once they see these for the younger ones.  In no way does it compare to an IPad but for a tablet at this price it works wonderfully!  I won't have to share my IPad anymore.  I'm very happy with these and will probably get another in black of course since my husband wants one now after seeing them.

Reviews.Title: this company scammed hundreds of people over Christmas
Reviews.Author: SgtMamma
Reviews.Content: This company scammed hundreds of people on Amazon over Christmas, ruining their Christmas -- as most had ordered this tablet for children.  They immediately charged our credit card, issued a fake tracking number and never sent the product.  But kept send emails that said "must be lost in the mail" THEY ARE SCAM ARTISTS.  If you don't have extra money to waste, do not order from this dispicable company.

Reviews.Title: Tablet worked pretty good (charging plug went bad)
Reviews.Author: Colin Faulkingham
Reviews.Content: The tablet worked surprisingly well for watching Netflix and playing games. However after 10 days mine stopped charging I am not sure why?

Reviews.Title: it's dead, my product worked for a while until today
Reviews.Author: Elisa Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Hi my product is not longer working, It worked only some days and then it started to freeze. I have to put it back.ThanksElisa Ramirez781 843 2505

Reviews.Title: Worked out of the box...will not charge out of 0% though
Reviews.Author: JASON E LILLY
Reviews.Content: Product arrived out of the box working with about 25% power remaining.  USe of touchscreen was fair with repeat strokes and mrore pressure required than that of an ipad or kindle.  Became slightly frustrating from time to time when having to repeat movements.  Battery died off and no longer able to charge with any of the charge methods provided.  Tried over 24 hours with different outlets and charging methods (USB/Direct Charge) with no luck.  Informed seller and they asked that I would need to send back to China, have it inspected and determine whether or not they would repair or send me a new one.  Delay would be lengthy and shipping out of country costly.  I requested an alternate option and they repeated the same email that had sent to have it sent.....essentially no in-depth reading in my request as there was not one question answered.  Must have received a fluke, although customer service was poor.  Would not purchase from them again.  Good luck to those enticed by the decreased price and little option for return incentives.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB
Reviews.Author: tweak45
Reviews.Content: This little tablet is an outstanding starter tablet for both adults and children. Its biggest advantage is that it comes rooted from the factory. With a fast SD card (Class 6 or better), it runs full screen, full motion, video without even straining and it's compatible with Kindle. Granted, the camera isn't the greatest but, hey, look at the price and move on. The WiFi connection is rock steady and this tablet can also be set up as a Wireless Hot Spot. Audio Quality is outstanding and it even has a rudimentary Graphic Equalizer, along with sound FX, included. Obviously, the video quality isn't what an iPad or one of the more expensive Android tablets would offer but, again, look at the price and move on. It's good enough that only a comparison with something a LOT better will show its shortcomings. You can set up one of three different kinds of start-up security but be warned: If you password protect this tablet you MUST use a USB keyboard to log on. Otherwise, you won't get in.There are a few small, (to me at least), problems with this tablet:1) I originally purchased this tablet from Sears and those, (I purchased two for my grands), had the Adobe Reader, Skype, Netflix, Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, Flipit, and Solitaire preloaded but this one did not. Apparently, this is a slightly different, (read: Newer), version of this tablet and that accounts for the difference in available out-of-the-box apps. That's not a con for me personally, but for those of you who buy a tablet for any of the above, be aware that you'll have to download all those apps.2) The viewing angles are actually pretty good EXCEPT....If you tilt the top of the tablet too far back, you will get what amounts to a negative image. The other viewing angles are about what you would expect with a flat screen. If you, as I did, buy this tablet with one of the keyboard cases that have the "kickstand" on the back, you won't have to worry about this problem except when using the tablet in Portrait position.3) The specs say it has 4Gb of internal storage but unless there is something here that I'm not aware of, this tablet has only 2.5Gb of actual, usable, internal storage. For me, that's no big deal because I'll be using it mostly as a reader for Kindle books. For someone who wants to load a bunch of apps and games, be aware: There is not as much internal storage space as you think there is. On the upside, the tablet will accept up to a 32Gb Micro SDHC card and you can also plug in a USB Flash Drive so storage space, (except for apps which just don't play well unless installed to the primary "hard drive"), is not really an issue.4) I'm not sure if this is really a con but I need to mention it. The battery life seems to be a bit short. I've gone from 100% to about 20% in a couple of hours of intense surfing. That said, I've also watched a 2+ hour movie with no problem at all, so it could just be me. On a brighter note, Comodo has a free battery saver app that's worth its weight in gold. So far, I've seen a 2x increase in battery life after installing that app.5) This tablet is woefully short on documentation. The included manual is nothing more than a Quick Start guide and there is a shortage of any kind of technical information about this tablet on the Net. After a bit of searching I found the manufacturer's web page, [...], but there is very little useful info there. Again, this is not a con for me personally, I do computers for a living, but the average user needs to be aware that if you buy this tablet, you'll need to do your own problem solving because there is very little in the way of help from the manufacturer.I put this tablet through rigorous testing over a period of a month. I did everything I could to it, short of actually "Bricking" it, (or throwing it against a wall), to see how much it could take and how well it performed. I actually got it to freeze but a quick Google session, (Hold the power button and the volume up button at the same time until the tablet shuts off [About 5 seconds]. Press and hold the power button as instructed in the manual to turn the tablet on and you're back in business), produced a solution to that problem. I can truthfully say that this tablet is built like a Timex. The Boomers who read that last will understand exactly what I mean by that and why, as a result, I'm giving this tablet a 5 star rating.I bought two of these as birthday presents for my grands and I liked them so much that I got one for me and will buy at least two more for two more of my grands. They come with everything you need, (USB OTG adapter, USB Data Cable, Stylus, Earphones, Screen protector, and Charger), and they can be used with a USB Keyboard/Mouse. You could even attach a USB Mini-Hub if you'd like. This particular version also solved the problem of the shaky charger connection and even included better quality, noise cancelling, in canal earphones.Bottom Line: If you're a fan of Great Performance to Price Ratio and you're looking to break into the world of tablets, without breaking the bank, you want this tablet. Just Buy It. You WON'T be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Made very Cheap!
Reviews.Author: vicki miller
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet, but it is made very poorly. The buttons broke off of the power and the volume within a couple days of getting it.

Reviews.Title: My Son
Reviews.Author: Jessica Marie Lacey
Reviews.Content: My son was very pleased and shocked with his own personal zeepad. It came ontime for Christmas and it was greatly appreciated....

Reviews.Title: So sad! Buyer be warned!
Reviews.Author: Kim_J
Reviews.Content: It is so sad that Amazon allows this seller to keep taking orders for this product. It is a piece of junk!!!!! I fell into the trap of buying two of them for Christmas presents this year. I was so embarrassed when they opened them up and tried to use them. They would work sporadically, but never for long. The rotten part is I had to pay roughly $10 each for shipping, then return shipping, and a 10% restocking fee. So this seller can just sit back and collect high shipping charges and restocking fees, so they still make money even when the buyers return them. Please don't by this product!

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: I didn't have high expectations when I purchased this for my 7 year old son, however, this didn't even meet those expectations.  It started freezing week 1, the volume button broke from turning up and down, it shuts down on its own, doesn't always start up.  It has ben a nightmare.  I wish I would have spend a little bit of extra money to get one worth spending the time.  My son doesn't play with it half the time because it's always freezing or force closing apps.  I won't touch it because I get even more frustrated with it.  NOT WORTH IT.

Reviews.Title: Useless, returned next day
Reviews.Author: Fleur-de-lis
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd "no-name" cheap tablet we purchased for our 4yo daughter. The first one worked for over a year which I consider a fair return on what we paid for it. Since that tablet is no longer on the market, we purchased another "no-name" device, figuring it'll all be the same. Boy, we were so wrong.To start with some positives, this tablet looks cool. It is small and lightweight, and it connected to our wifi fast. Now I will elaborate on why I gave it one star. We don't expect much of those cheap tablets, we only want it to load and play the internet videos and display pictures. That is what our daughter uses it for. However, this tablet would not load the videos. Youtube website will load, but the video will be loading and loading forever. It might have loaded eventually, but I never waited for longer than 5 minutes. I figured, it it takes 5+ minuted for a simple few minutes video to load, my daughter will have a problem with it. I was very disappointed, I so wanted to keep this little tablet.Another thing we noticed, is that the tablet would shut down periodically on its own. What the heck is that, so annoying. Plus the battery life is measle, it lost 50% of its charge in about 30mins being turned on and connected to wifi. And finally, I made sure I ordered a black device. However, the one delivered to us was red. The stylus was not included either, although advertised.All in all, this parody of a tablet went back the very next day. Amazon was great, made the return easy, fast and simple. Needless to say, I would strongly advise to stay away from this product. It is just a waste of money, time and energy.

Reviews.Title: worst purchase i ever made DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: tiffany wisdom "tiffany wisdom"
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT 2 OF THESE FOR MY KIDS THEY HAD THEM A WEEK AND THE SCREEN STARTED FLICKERING AND TURNING GREEN... NOW THE POWER BUTTON HAS BROKE OFF AND FELL IN THE INSIDE.... THIS ITEM IS A PIECE OF CRAP PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM, GO THE EXTRA MILE AND SPEND A LITTLE MORE AND GET A WAY BETTER TABLET THAN THIS ONE...

Reviews.Title: Great for a younger child!
Reviews.Author: Msleela
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my nephew so he can skype with family members while he is away from home. He can use Facebook, Netflix, it's easy to set up and easy to navigate for a younger child or a teenager that is not responsible enough for a laptop or Ipad. You can downloaded apps on this piece of technology.

Reviews.Title: great pad
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: For a 3g not bad, equal to others that's 4.0 ice cream , I use it to watch movies , do enjoy not having to carry my laptop around  all the time

Reviews.Title: Gave it for a christmas present
Reviews.Author: dmclauri
Reviews.Content: My daughter wont put it down and now the other kids want one. my daugther loves her new tablet. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Nancy Wolf
Reviews.Content: I love it but the battery life sucks big time.  I get 20 mins tops.  When I first got it it I got 2-1/2 hrs so IDK what happened to it and I've only had it for about two weeks.  If it had good battery I'd giive it five stars but since it doesn't I only give it three.  IDK if something is wrong w/it or if that's the nature of this item.  I've turned down the brightneess and tried other things but to no avail.  Its a great tablet tho so the battery issue isn't a deal breaker for me as I'm not taking it out of my home.  Is a bad battery life normal for this item?

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: mizzkeys2u
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with this tablet, the price was great and the web surfing speed is incredible! this was a great buy....Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a toddlers toy
Reviews.Author: Stacy Rich
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a cheap Christmas present for my toddler son. It has good battery life, easy to use and perfect for his reading and apps. I wouldn't recommend heavy serious use only recreational.

Reviews.Title: Tablets
Reviews.Author: Madaline
Reviews.Content: My boys enjoy their tablets that I purchase them for Christmas. The Google play is very awesome I. I find all the apps my kids love to play.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad is ok for the price
Reviews.Author: stilljojo "JoAnn"
Reviews.Content: I just received my Zeepad, I bought it for my husband who is NOT computer savvy and thought it would be easy for him to use to look up things on the internet and maybe put a few games on it.Cons.  The manual that comes is very very tiny and also in broken English, probably used a translating program so you tend to scratch your head a bit.. that is IF you can read it, the print is so small I had to get a magnifier to read it and then discovered it was of almost no use at all.  So without any instructions it was/is hard to sort of figure out how it works.  It took me a considerable amount of time just to figure out how to set up the internet WiFi.... but once I figured out the simplicity of it.. it was set up in seconds .  The downside is that sometimes the device just does not want to let you get onto the internet even when the signal is strong.. unsure what is causing that issue... but you can come back later and try it and it might go onto the internet easily.. so don't know what is hanging it up.The device itself feels a bit flimsy but is also very light weight. The screen colors are fine and the sound is "just ok" .  I haven't tried Netflix yet but if there are issues I will edit this review.The battery is not very good, and I am not wild about the charger that came with it, however you can use it and play games on it while it is plugged in and being charged.  The type of battery that is in it.. the instructions say it is better to let it run out completely before you recharge it.. and if you have issues because you have charged it to soon.. to let the battery run out completely then recharge it.On the Positive side... For the price ($77.00) it is a pretty decent little handheld.  It accesses tons of games, almost all of the  same games I have on my Kindle Fire.. many many free ones and most games are between 99 cents to 2.99. The game downloads go easy and the game play is fine. The touch screen is very responsive and it takes only a gentle touch to play the games or select items.  I do plan to expand the memory with a micro sd card but may find that I don't need to.  I have half a dozen games on it right now and in less than 24 hours I am getting to understand the device. It is not a Kindle or a Ipad.. it is what it is.. which is a ok value for what you pay for it.  I dont mind the quirks with the internet for I think I will be able to figure that out as time goes by.  I originally bought it for my husband to be able to look thinks up on the internet but think I will probably just load games on it and let it go at that.. my husband will use it a bit or the grand kids will surely play the games so it was worth the price just to have a small handheld game player around for them to play.Would I buy it again? probably  Would I give it as a gift?  probably  of course this opinion is based on only having the device up and running for 24 hours  and hard to predict if it will hold up.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Kia
Reviews.Content: The only problem is that I have yet o find out no to put on the parental control. I bought 2 of these for my 5yr old and my soon o be 3 yr old. They both love it.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Jackie Lilleodden
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for kids.  My son uses his for games, music, craigslist, and facebook.  We haven't checked out the netflix yet but we are completely satisfied for the price. I would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: Pad for Grandkids
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: First I want to say that, when I ordered these the price was 79.99. The very next day the seller (ENGINE 29) put them on sale at 69.99. You may say ok that's just 10.00, but I ordered 3 of these.  I contacted them and they informed me that they could not change the price or give me credit for the difference. I could understand if it was a week or so later. But the next day. The pad are great. They are really fast for the size and perfect for the grandkids. They came already ready to go with games and wifi ready. I ordered the cases that have the keypads to them as well. So they are totally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Trudy
Reviews.Content: The shipment was fast and on time love doing business with u guys thanks now my kids can have a wonderful new year with their gift

Reviews.Title: Real Nice
Reviews.Author: Randy Landry
Reviews.Content: One of the best tablets out right now They Love Them Will Bye Another one if the price go back down...

Reviews.Title: Kids love it
Reviews.Author: Christine E Becker
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these for Christmas presents for my kids, 14, 12, and 10.They wanted a tablet of their own, and I wanted them to stop hogging my ASUS 32 gig tab; especially since they have already broken it once (Thank goodness for extended warranties from Best Buy). I was a little skeptical because I bought my other son a knock off brand tablet last year and it was literally a piece of crap straight out of the box, but these tablets seem to be exactly what I was looking for the kids. They can play all of their games and download them from the play store. They can watch netflix, and even skype one another from their rooms, which they have already done. (Weird!) I hope it stands the test of time...at least a year would be nice.

Reviews.Title: Charger is either refurbished or used, and it doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: I would like to write a review on this product, but I cannot turn it on. The charger that I received is broken. It is not the charger shown in the picture, the one I was told I was going to receive, and when it is plugged into the tablet, it doesn't set flush to the tablet. Therefore, I have not been able to even turn on the tablet. I'm very frustrated considering this was a Christmas gift, mind you I spent almost $30 on shipping to have it arrive before Christmas, and now I can't even give it as a gift. I'm not satisfied.

Reviews.Title: UnPleasantly surprised!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Addison
Reviews.Content: Update - Well it worked great the first day but now large portions of the screen are unresponsive.  I am sending it back for a refund.  Very disappointed!-----------------Previous reviewSo I just received my Zeepad last night.  First impression out of the box, it is better than I expected.  I ordered it thinking how good could a $70 dollar tablet be. and how much can it really do compared to the more expensive brands and models?  Well I was surprised.  It is a bit heavier than I expected, but that just gives it a more substantial feel.I have a 'better' tablet already.  I have the ASUS Eee Pad TF101 32Gb and love it.  But I was wanting something a bit smaller that wouldn't break the bank.  I read alot on my tablet so it goes almost everywhere with me, but the ASUS can be a little big for the handbag:)  I wanted something that would fit better in my purse for on-the-go reading, but I also wanted a bit more then just an ereader in case I wanted to look something up on the internet or play a game to pass time somewhere.  Yes I could have gone with the KindleFire or Nook Tablet but they are still well over $100+.  I also like having access to the wide variety of Apps that are available with Android.  I'm not totally sure what all is available with Kindle and Nook.I saw this and several people who purchased had said they were pleased so I decided to give it a try.It connected to my home wireless easily.  The touch screen is responsive, much better than I expected. I immediatly went to Google Play and began downloading and installing Apps I wanted.  No problems there.  I went to the browser and everything was working OK except for one of my favorite web pages.  When it loaded all I got was a blank screen.  Reloading didn't help.  I went back to the Apps store and downloaded Firefox and Opera web browsers to see if they would display the page.  Finally after paying with settings I got my page to come up in Opera.  I'm really not sure why this web page was having such a problem on this tablet but i got it to work so I'm happy:)With the display only being 800x480 everything is not as crisp as my ASUS but by increasing the font size on my ebooks they read OK.  I haven't tried any videos or the camera on it yet so can't address those at this time, but then that wasn't the primary reason I wanted it.  Also haven't tried to connect it to my laptop to see how syncing and transfering files over to it works.  The web browsering and reading capabilities, in a more portable size, was what I wanted and for those pursposes I am happy with it.We'll see how it goes after a few weeks with it:)

Reviews.Title: She's enjoying it
Reviews.Author: Tarche
Reviews.Content: I ordered this from a company called Goodios and it came with a pen and car charger and this company was very accurate whenever i would email them.. My baby loves it and it is well worth the money......So far so good!!! !

Reviews.Title: Not as Described From Moma Imports, Better From Goodios
Reviews.Author: Cecil
Reviews.Content: My sister and I each purchased one of these from Moma Imports and both are really poor quality compared to the same product from Goodios.  From Moma there is no labeling on the buttons, the preloaded apps described on the product pages are not there, they are missing.  The included earphones stylus and screen protector that are normally included from other sellers are missing as well.  The battery lasts only 45 minutes with screen brightness turned down as low as possible on the Moma tablet but last 2 1/2 hours on the same product from Goodios.  These (Moma) are not nearly the quality and completeness that others are receiving from other sellers.  Mine was defective (would freeze whenever screen blanked) and I returned it.  When I purchased the replacement it came from Goodios and that unit was MUCH better and did not have any of the deficiencies of the ones which were supplied by Moma..  I can only guess but as a systems engineer I suspect that these (Moma) are factory seconds or somehow a different production run that the normal units and I would avoid purchasing them from Moma based on what we have experienced.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Dan White
Reviews.Content: Was a little nervous looking at some of the reviews of this product, but purchased it for a couple reasons. It fit my budget and it seemed to be a great starter tablet. So with no basis for comparison here goes.I purchased this for my wife so she could do words with friends and such without having to drag her laptop to bed with her. Neither of us have used a tablet before so keep that in mind.PROS:It arrived packed securely before the expected arrival date (2 days early)It had about a 50% charge when it came, but I stuck it on the charger and left it there for the remainder fo the day (5 hours), the following day I got it back out and started to set it up. The battery lasted all day, but I was working on it it intermittently.WiFi set up was a breezeThe app store had all of the apps I was looking for and the ui was very intuitiveThe screen is very responsive and the colors are vibrant.CONSIt did not come with a screen protector for some reason (minor complaint)The camera is not very good quality considering the average throw away cell phone comes with better image quality these days, but as far as the skype app goes it was a bonus but not why I bought this.In the end for the money I cant imagine getting a better starter tablet than this.

Reviews.Title: Eh, for the price...
Reviews.Author: Maria A. Cruz
Reviews.Content: Its functional... sort of...  For my 8 year old, she uses it to play games, and it is decent for that purpose.  But it doesn't hold a battery charge for very long, maybe lasting for about an hour.  Also the actual plug connection for the zeepad is crap.  You have to play with the cord and jam it into the tablet in order to get the darn zeepad to charge.  The charger is not the typical UBS or iPad type, but a thin connector, which is impossible to buy at regular stores.  So when the battery goes dead on a car ride, you are simply out of luck.  My recommendation?  Spend a bit more and get something that has more of a battery charge and easier to charge.

Reviews.Title: Son is very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Ellis
Reviews.Content: My ten year old saved his allowance for a tablet and chose this one, primarily because unlike most cheap off-brand tablets, it includes Google Play.We also own a 1st-gen Kindle Fire and this compares favorably.  It's roughly the same speed, but running Android 4.0 instead of the modified 2.3 on the Fire makes it a much better experience.I foresee the 4GB internal storage becoming too small eventually, but since it supports adding storage with a card, I'm okay with this.  Especially from my son's perspective, better to get the price down as low as possible to start with, and allow expanding it later.The one complaint I have is that it comes with a proprietary charging cable.  (It also comes with a USB cable, but I assume that is only for transferring files.)We were pleasantly surprised to find an included stylus in the box.  To be honest, I'm not sure what art programs we should look for to take advantage of this, but it was a nice bonus.All in all, for the price this is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Not what i thought ...
Reviews.Author: wandaful
Reviews.Content: I got the tablet with the expectation of it as being BRAND NEW out the box, but instead it was slightly used, with some scratches on the screen.  It appeared to have had some previous settings on it which I had to adjust. It also in the beginnning had problems with wifi connection.  its still not picking up  good when I leave the house.  Overall, it's an okay tab, a bit slow with some of the connections like netflix and it freezes up sometimes.  My opinion is to invest in a Brand you can trust.  I got this for my grand daughter.  Good for gaming.  I got myself a Kindle Fire, which I throughly ENJOY!!!!!! My grand daughter wants to switch and always is getting mine to watch netflix and to go online for stuff like Disney.

Reviews.Title: not for kids
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Reviews must be at least 20 words longBecause of the price, we purchased two of these for our kids. Within two weeks the first on broke. now 1 month later, the second one is done for. Both were dropped on the VERY SENSITIVE power on/off button, braking the button right. I claim some responsiblity but very poor design.

Reviews.Title: poor poor battery
Reviews.Author: from NC
Reviews.Content: I can use this device for less than 30 minutes before needs charging -completely useless !!! Device is sluggish -speaker is bad

Reviews.Title: I hate it..
Reviews.Author: William Baiza "Willb14"
Reviews.Content: This item was new and did not work correctly...and to send back it was crazy it took about 8 weeks to get my money back........

Reviews.Title: Unknown Product
Reviews.Author: Lydia
Reviews.Content: No appropriate information is available to set the tablet up when you receive it.  What few directions are sent in the package must be read with a magnifying glass.  We will have to spend hours on my PC at home searching ways in which to bring this tablet to its supposed ability of use.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Eursla Houston
Reviews.Content: As far as the tablet goes i purchased it for my 10 yr old daughter.She loves it. It's actually better than the Polaroid one i purchased for my son. The graphics are nice and crisp,but the camera sucks.I wish it would have came with better directions. All in all well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Can't wait to get this, really looking forward to learning how it works
Reviews.Author: Dr Susan Helman
Reviews.Content: Have not received yet.  I can't wati to see how it works and am hopeful that it is everything I thought it would be

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Bill Lawlor
Reviews.Content: It came with everything in the box.  It has a real nice picture.  It is very fast for it's size.  It was money well spent.Thank YouBill

Reviews.Title: great economical alternative to the I-pad
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: has a microphone, and camera and works off a google platform.  I tried several other low price tablets.  They all lacked something.  The Zeepad is the best I have found for the price.  Other than being slightly slower and having somewhat less "user friendly controls" for my 2 and 7 year old, it is great.  And given the cost savings you cant beat it.  My girls love their new tablets.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: itisus
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something to do some e-book reading on but don't want a single use device like a Kindle.  I never understood the whole Ipad thing, but now that I got this (and at a price that made it reasonable to get, not like buying another laptop) I am very impressed.  Not the greatest screen, the fastest processor or anything.  But I can read books, I can watch youTube, browse the internet, etc. and stick it in my pocket (a big coat pocket).  Seems to work great after having it a week.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: janet
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Tablet primarily to read on. It is a great tablet to read on. I only wished that I had purchased a tablet locally. The only way my Zeepad will charge is via the usb. It will not charge from the outlet, only by PC. Battery life is not very long either. After about two hours of reading its time to charge.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert Littleton
Reviews.Content: I enjoy that this tablet runs on the android system. The android system is very user friendly. The tablet and its system overall is user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: cindy r
Reviews.Content: This tablet was the right one for my son.  It is perfert to start out with.  He had no problems learning how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Goggles Pisano
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for less on the sears site a few weeks ago.  I've only had the zeepad for a couple weeks so I'm not sure about reliability.  So far, I'm very happy with the purchase.  I wanted something simple to use for ebooks, occasional videos, web and email use.  I downloaded the Kindle App and it works flawlessly.  The capacitive touch screen is much better than the cheap Archos tablet I had (which quit after a year).  I watched part of a netflix video on the zeepad and it ran well, but the dark scenes didn't show up well due to low contrast.  All other applications I've run were plenty colorful and vibrant.  The processing speed seems better than other cheap tablets.  One little quirk, but so far I haven't been able to keep the time consistently accurate.  It goes back to some factory programmed time zone (maybe China).  The battery doesn't seem to last more than 2-3 hours with constant average use.  Also, the actual screen size is a little smaller than most 7" tablets but not so much it matters.  The unit does resemble a large GPS navigation system in looks (which doesn't matter to me).  Overall, I am impressed with the quality of the tablet for the price.  It's probably worth $100-$150 when compared to others I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Not the same product
Reviews.Author: onique
Reviews.Content: The tablet I received was not the same product I order!! Instead of my zeepad they sent me a Yeahpad!! It does not keep a charge!! I am so upset

Reviews.Title: A gift for my daughter=)
Reviews.Author: Lesa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas.  I wanted to buy something cheaper than the ipad but still plays movies, apps, music.  She loves it.  It came recommended on here.  We love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Norfis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Worth the wait... Didn't get it on time, but better late than never... Good tablet for kids and adults too.

Reviews.Title: Made my 8yr old son the Happiest kid this Christmas!
Reviews.Author: mkreader
Reviews.Content: This purchase was the best purchase i could have made.  My 8yr old son wanted a tablet like his father, but I didn't want to invest a lot of money.  This does everything i needed it to do.  Shipping scared me a little it was towards the end of the delivery time that i was quoted, but it did arrive. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Dont order
Reviews.Author: Austen
Reviews.Content: Read all the reviews prior to ordering n thought people were maybe just over exagerating this shit sucks, i ordered 2 of them the first coming 2 weeks later when shoulda only took 3 days maybe if it was ups id understand but not mail thats fast, showing the laziness of the seller. On top of that just as other reviews say they come scratched your either selling me used shit calling it new Or dont know how to pack stuff corrctly knowing its going across country. The second ones taking longer n ill be suprised if it shows up before christmas.  Im sure my gf n gma will still like them but for the price at least take care of it n if they dont plan on refunding my account for both n receiving them back its bull shit i spend almost 170 for crap.

Reviews.Title: Very good product...
Reviews.Author: denis
Reviews.Content: I recieved this the day I was supposed to, I love it... don't believe all the negative reviews you read about this. So far it does everything I want it to do. The battery life is not very long it lasts about 2.5 hrs before it needs charged. The wifi works great, I get a signal in places I usually don't. The screen is bright and the colors are great, I have not watched any videos on it but the one it came with and it was crystal clear. Games work great on this, I have several so far, I do recommend getting a card for it to hold more...but overall it works great. The touch screen is very responsive, I did have to tap it a couple of times to get it to respond, but overall it's not a high end high dollar tablet. so far i am very pleased with it...

Reviews.Title: Handy item
Reviews.Author: Dian C Flouro
Reviews.Content: This item is easy to carry and use at work, and will come in handy for travelling verus carrying a laptop.I was not thrilled w/the seller, as it took a very long time to get to me.I recommend the product, not the seller I purchased it from.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made power cords
Reviews.Author: Barbara Cloney
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my twins:First Issue: a prong broke off of the wall power cord IN THE WALL... thank God my 4 year old didn't try to take it out on his own.  Second Issue: Other twin's power cord came bent and doesn't work.Third Issue:  After contacting Amazon and finding that there was no contact phone number for distributor, I got a new Zeepad in the mail.  THIS power cord doesn't even fit into the device, therefore rendering that power cord useless....LAST and FINAL:  Resorted to the USB port to plug into the computer.  Son brought USB to show me....missing the metal part that goes around the prongs that go into the computer.  The metal that protects these prongs was still stuck into the USB port of my computer.The device itself is fine....IF YOU CAN GET IT CHARGED!

Reviews.Title: replaced
Reviews.Author: Alan gavami
Reviews.Content: This is an addition to my original review. The company edge cuter send me another zeepad for my doughter, but my doughter was now disappointed with the product. So I emailed the company and they worked with me to get this problem resolved. My son wanted a blue colored one. So I send the new pink one that I just had received in the mail and they send me aBlue colored zeepad for my son. It is not the fastest tablet but for the price and the companies cooperation in resolving this problem, I can't really complain. They fix the  Issues and improved their shipping methods, so the electronics are more protected during shipping. Because I know UPS or USPS just throw boxes around and couldn't care less what's in them. So overall as far as customer service the company did a great job, and my son loves his blue color tablet. It is his first one, and its been working fine so far. Thanks GaryAlan gavami.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: chestube
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband for christmas. Very easy for him to use. He loves to be able to read books on it. Gave 4 because battery life is short

Reviews.Title: An excellent introduction to the Android system
Reviews.Author: Edsel
Reviews.Content: An inexpensive way to explore the Google/Android galaxy. Our household owns iPads/iPhones/Touch's and a Windows 8 Tablet so the Zeepad was my experiment to test and compare the Android ecosystem. The Zeepad's processing performance is excellent, the screen is good, the user manual is a fun read because the translation to english is so bad. You can download much better instructions for the 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS from a variety of sources on the internet. The Zeepad even came with a charger, touch-pen, and ear-buds.If you are curious about the Android OS system the Zeepad is the tablet to get.

Reviews.Title: camera not there
Reviews.Author: Tami Eshelman
Reviews.Content: I specifically wanted a tablet that my daugther could take photos and video with as well as skype her sister who is away at college.  The specifications said it did it all.  Well yes technically it does it all, but the only camera and video is FACING the user!  So no dual camera...  disappointing to say the least.  But it shipped fast, and was really low priced.  And it functions well.  It holds battery life well and even without the camera, my daugther LOVES it.  She takes it on her daddy weekends so she can watch Netflix and check her facebook.  It seems to be quite sturdy too and the screen has a nice resolution.  I would recommend it unless you want the dual camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Anita Gillyard
Reviews.Content: For the price it is great. However it's not the highest quality. The kids are happy to have it. Functions are suitable for most activities.

Reviews.Title: Pink Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it. I love the color, shape, and even the fact that its android. The only problem is that it dies really fast, even when I'm not on it. But the fact of how cool it is blows that fact away.

Reviews.Title: She's Happy
Reviews.Author: Jade231
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her first tablet. She not big on current technology. (Hard to believe in today's society. Right) She just wanted a tablet (check). To be able to access the internet (check) and to be able to play games (check). She's satisfied. I'm satisfied . My job is done.

Reviews.Title: Amazing hardware for so little money
Reviews.Author: ZeRoDeLaY
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 10 year old son. He and I both love thia tablet. It is super fast, holds tons of apps and never seems to slow down. He uses it for netflix and games everyday. Netflix, youtube and every other app seems to work perfectly. If I could do it over again I would buy two of them Thats how awesome it is!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for price
Reviews.Author: Amanda Firkins
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought for my 7 year old daughter as a Christmas present. It does pretty much anything that any other basic tablet would do. My daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great Kid's tablet!
Reviews.Author: Nicole E. Trammell
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 12yr old to watch movies and play games.  It has been great.  Works for youtube, email and other social networking.  The camera isn't that good, but everything else seems to be working great.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Charles Hammond
Reviews.Content: shipped quickly, they are very slow compared to my S4, but that is what i expected for $62.  They (eventually) run every app I have tried and it helps to teach my kids patience.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Christina Hagan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 year old for Christmas.  He's had it for 3 months and mostly plays games on it.  His only complaints are that it is slower than he would like and that the touch is sometimes delayed.  He has been able to download several games with no problems.  He had one issue with it freezing and showing only lines when rebooted but after letting it sit overnight is was fine.  Haven't had a problem since.  I think it is a great deal for the price we paid.  After 6 months if anything changes I will update my review.

Reviews.Title: Worth The Price
Reviews.Author: John B. Emerson
Reviews.Content: it's well worth the price ($62), I use it to watch videos, they look great, speaker stinks but sounds great with headphones or buds...works good with skype....processor is slow at times...main camera is lousy but camera facing you is ok for skype...also use it to read pdf and other documents, works ok most of the time, need the lighting to be right...using a 16gb micro card, works fine....battery only lasts 3-4 hours if you leave it on, lasts much longer if you power it off....AC power cord charges much faster than usb, actually came with a fully charged battery which was surprising...accepts most popular apps...get what you pay for, I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kayla Metcalf
Reviews.Content: Can not beat the price. Bought for my 8 year old daughter. She loves it and it competes with $400 tablets. I thought it was going to be very slow, but I want one now!

Reviews.Title: They do not honor their warranties
Reviews.Author: Maxine Blocker-burnette
Reviews.Content: My zee pad stopped working after less than 5 months.  It worked very well for 4 months then started acting up and finally just stopped working.  The company told me I did not return it in the 90 day return period.  When I bought the tablet it said it had a one year warranty.  Well it stopped working after 4.5 months.  At the time I purchased the item it said it had a one year warranty.  My advice don't buy from Goodios.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for older kids
Reviews.Author: gfcf momma
Reviews.Content: bought 3 of these for my kids for christmas and bought the warranty with them....the kids love them and so do we. word of advice, get the warranty through square trade, well worth it and we had the refund on the broken tablet within 3 days.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal even though there are minor issues...
Reviews.Author: Desert Rain Photography
Reviews.Content: For the price I would had expected a whole lot less. My first thought was that it felt like a toy but then I saw a front and rear facing camera. It charged quickly and does 99% of what my iPad 2 does. I bought it because I'm a tech, web designer and programmer and I need to check my stuff on Android devices. Even though at first look it may seem cheap it's not, it's a bargain. LOL! This little device has more computing power than all of NASA's computers when they sent me to the moon. The peeps leaving negative responses... Please try and understand there are two kinds of people... People that are grateful and like stuff and then there are people that win the weekly lottery and bitch for the rest of their lives they didn't win more. Bottom line, This pad is a steal of a deal and way better than not having on e at all...

Reviews.Title: Tablet for children
Reviews.Author: Pastor Yvette Smith
Reviews.Content: I have no complaint I have bought a total of 5 Zeepad 7" and my grandchildren love their tablets.  I getting ready to have to order another one.Pastor Smith

Reviews.Title: the tablet is good but not sturdy
Reviews.Author: Monique Sears
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet for my kids ... it plays minecraft and other games with no prob...however my sons tablet broke within 2 months....it isn't the most sturdy--- if you do buy it..get a case and tell your kids to go easy when charging it and handling it.....

Reviews.Title: What is the problem with this product?!
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: I first ordered this product from another vendor through Amazon and had to return it because it would not turn on anymore. Ordered a new one from this vendor and now only after having for a couple of weeks, the screen is white with lines. I'm going to return this and get an entirely new product. No more Zeepad for me.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: LaDonnia
Reviews.Content: this item didnt last for a year  my daughter was disappointed and now i have to purchase her another tablet

Reviews.Title: Got four of these for my kids
Reviews.Author: Undefinable
Reviews.Content: I thought these tablets were going to go out after a few uses. Surprisingly, they are still working after several uses, charges, and drops.Pros: Work just as well as other Android tabletsCons: Battery doesn't hold long. (This is a Pro me since the tablets are for my kids)  Camera resolution is low

Reviews.Title: Bought for my children
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Roomes"
Reviews.Content: This item is perfect for children between the ages of 4-12. I just hope it will last as its gone 4 months already with zero issues.

Reviews.Title: Great cheaper tablet
Reviews.Author: Shay
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kids for Christmas and they love it. It was packaged very well and worked perfectly right out the box. It already has Google play on it and some apps already installed. Its been a week and it still works fine. I would definitely recommend this tablet as a cheaper alternative to the higher one's.

Reviews.Title: Not an iPad but a value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Have had for a few weeks and even has been dropped a couple of times and still works. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 14 year old daughter. Its nice for her to have instead of carting around her laptop around when she just wants to use the net or facebook or play games.

Reviews.Title: Slow.
Reviews.Author: brant
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. They are decent for the price. Slow running though and each one I have has a slightly different software than the other. Not sure why but they serve there purpose. Now my kids leave my Kindle Fire alone.

Reviews.Title: Fun tablet
Reviews.Author: Peter Bouzianis
Reviews.Content: I gave this tablet away to my customers as a promotional giveaway and they love it connect to the Internet quickly and search the Internet pretty fast

Reviews.Title: YOU RUINED MY DAUGHTERS CHRISTMAS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: James Johnson
Reviews.Content: THIS THING HAS TROUBLE DOWNLOADING APPS AND IF IT CAN DOWNLOAD AN APP THEN IT HAS TROUBLE LOADING IT IT SHUTS OFF OR REBOOTS.....I HOPE SOMEBODY CAN DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS ASAP...

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Good tablet for the price. Android apps are available so thats awesome, it is not a high dollar tablet because you didn't pay high dollar. Any bad review is flawed. You get what you pay for and more!

Reviews.Title: Good For Price
Reviews.Author: Shawn Prejean
Reviews.Content: My son and I use our tablets nearly every day.  They are not the best, slow processor, sometimes lags or freezes, but for the price I am happy with the product.  If you are buying it just to keep a kid busy, or as an ereader it an acceptable product.  If you are a tech gadget nut then you shouldn't be trying to skimp on price to try and get a high end product.  Also, if you plan to watch movies on it i.e. Netflix, HBOGO, Hulu......... then get the biggest SD card you can find for it, without it none of them will play.

Reviews.Title: YES!!!
Reviews.Author: Callahan
Reviews.Content: First of all, the tablet got here two days earlier than stated when I placed my order.  I love the fact that there where a lot of different apps already installed on the device.  It is very user friendly.  My 4 yr old loves playing the games on it and watching movies as well (it keeps her busy while I do house work).  I have not had any problems with it so far and everything works very well.  It's not a Apple product or anything like that but it is GREAT for what it does cost.  Got this one for under $70.00 and I plan to write an update on it in the future.  Good buy for kids and teens...and parents who don't want to spend a lot of money.  lolUPDATE:Today (2/08/2014), nearly 2 months later, the screen on the tablet went out.  I strongly suggest that you purchase a warranty if you are able to because this item will tend to have a few issues.  It is slow at loading at times as well.  But I still stand by what I said before...it's a great buy for kids, teens, and parents who don't want to spend a lot of money.  You get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Awful, dont waste your money,
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Campbell
Reviews.Content: Broke in a matter of weeks. Wasn't even worth the money. The charging port is trash. Within two weeks couldnt even charge it

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: s. brubaker
Reviews.Content: It must be made out of eggshells. Or made to self destruct after it's too late to send back. It wasn't used hard at all and the screen just cracked. After like a month or two.

Reviews.Title: not a bad deal,  but description lies.
Reviews.Author: magda
Reviews.Content: the shipping was fast,  the device works,  but the specs are dishonest.  it says 4GB capacity,  but it only came with one,  and one for the sd card.  i had to put an 8GB sd card before i gave it to my friend as a gift.  i couldn't just guve it to her with such grossly unmet specs.  i dont know if dealers know this,  but it is illegal to sell some something that does not match it's advertised description.  you can't someone you're gonna sell them a chicken,  and give them a dog.  who do approach about compensation??

Reviews.Title: Very easy to operate!
Reviews.Author: jamie hang
Reviews.Content: Resolution is not as good compare to the higher end tablets but still a good quality overall. So far no lag and runs better than expected. Perfect for the younger ones.

Reviews.Title: temp tablet won't last long
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Robbins
Reviews.Content: Worked great for 6 months then power button came off power board and there is no way to repair it.  Spend a little more or buy one with a repair/replacement plan.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: Norma Ruckey
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the ZEEPad's  On this one (pink) the camera picture is blurry.  the other (green) the picture is OK.  I already have several apps downloaded and e mail set up and have since thrown away the return slip.  I am leaving Thursday for a week.  So I am hesitant to return.  Is there anything else I cando.  Everything else seems OK with the exception of the fuzziness of the camera.  Maybe there is a focus button I cannot locate.

Reviews.Title: good if you plan on buying protection plan at time you buy tablet otherwise not good item
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: i have bought two of these for my 11 and 10 yr old boys who only use them indoors sitting down no rough housing or anything like that and they seemed to be really good at first. the first one bought was working fine then only two months later it stopping working correctly. a month after i bought the first i bought a second one and when it arrived it already had problems with some things now only over one month of having it the touch screen stopped working also. so with in few mo s both are not able to be used due to touch screen not working anymore. if u buy this also buy protection plan. because if not you will be stuck with useless electronics also.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: carolyn chandler
Reviews.Content: This was a piece of junk and the seller never responded to my request for help.it worked for two weeks and then the tabs started to fall off form the inside and it was humpy dumpy from that point on. I'm not poverty stricken,but I don'tHave that kind of money to just give away.No matter how old the child is don't disappoint them with this product.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Sharon Perry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandaughter. It was slow from the start & I should have returned it then but made the mistake of letting her keep it, now three months later it doesn't work at all, it is junk! I should have got her a Kindle or a Nook, I guess you get what you pay for! I received no help from the seller or the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Thought it would last longer than 2 months!!
Reviews.Author: cdhj1234
Reviews.Content: Had this tablet for 2 months. It has frozen several times and now will not hold a charge. The charger broke within the first month. The tablet will not charge at all now. I can't return it because it is out of the time window to return. No idea how to contact seller!! Very frustrating!!

Reviews.Title: Slows and freeze up often
Reviews.Author: Donaisha Walker
Reviews.Content: Terribly slow!!!!! Don't buy! I buy it for my child who loves tablets even she can't deal with the  terrible drag....

Reviews.Title: excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Ana Jacquelinne Bueno Perez "Miami"
Reviews.Content: my daughter loved it.!! she can surf the net, go to her facebook and play some games. Has loads of applications to download, plus you can use nexflix and you tube. I recommend it, for me it was an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the notepad.  The product was a good value for the quality of the merchandise.  Would highly reccommend.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Nicolalda
Reviews.Content: I'm giving this product a negative start due to many issues that this tablet has. First, the power switch on this tablet does not work. I bought this tablet for Christmas for my niece who still can use it since this tablet came defected from the seller. The seller "engine29" has no idea how to run its business since I shipped this tablet to be fixed since the power switch has defected problems. After expending $19.00 for shipping, they e-mailed me requesting $15.00 to fixed their defected tablet plus another payment to ship this tablet back. The tablet cost me $69.99 plus $19.00, Now!!! they want $15.00 plus shipping charges. I'm not happy with this tablet and seller products. This is my first time I'm writting negative reviews since other sellers are willing to keep their business honest and profitable.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Gadget_girl
Reviews.Content: This little tablet is good for taking anywhere you want it does everything a computer would do I have 3 kids and they all have one its perfect for them and they love it

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeeepad is junk
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The screen is not very clear. It is very slow. Power button broke off and fell inside of pad less than 2 weeks after recieving making it unuseable. Dont wast your money.  Gave one star because that is lowest possible.  It deserves negative stars. Most disapointing purchase of my life.

Reviews.Title: For my Kids
Reviews.Author: Destiny J.
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my kids and for them its perfect for the few apps that they like. They love it.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: Larry5357
Reviews.Content: I like this product very appordable to buy very easy to used by young and adults and i want to buy this product again for a gift to my family and friend im satiesfied ......,

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rigoberto
Reviews.Content: Very responsive touchscreen, used it for games like Minecraft and Angry Birds. We got it for my little sister and she loved it, but broke it a while back by sitting on the cord while it was charging, therefore breaking the charging area inside the device. I used it sometimes for email and things, I would also download the games for her, never had a problem with it. Very good buy, would buy it again for somebody else.

Reviews.Title: Good kid's tablet
Reviews.Author: K. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these tablets for my 5-year old twins because I was tired of them stealing my tablet.  This is not a Kindle Fire or iPad kind of tablet (the processor is not super fast, the screen response is slower and the battery life isn't stellar), however it works great for my little ones and I'm not worried about it all the time.  My kids can play their favorite games to their hearts' content.  It arrived promptly and even included a screen cover.  I'm happy with this product and my shopping expereince with this dealer.

Reviews.Title: only worked one week then screen turns on and goes black
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: screen turns on and goes black and when i contacted to find out what to do i got blown off very disapointed paid for a peace of garbage

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried cause of the price but its pretty perfect I ranked it 4 stars cause the WiFi on it is pretty frustrating. It will disconnect constantly and and the instructions they send you tell you how to fix it but its not a permanent fix. You have to constantly turn the WiFi off and back on but it takes forever to turn back on. And it won't automatically connect to the internet even if you have signal you have to manually go in and connect. But other than the crappy WiFi it works great!

Reviews.Title: For my daughter
Reviews.Author: Pat Sadler
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it.  She left it in a friend's car and he used it and loved it.  So, this seems to be a winner.  I have a Kindle and for the price difference, this can't be beat.  She says the camera is also very good.

Reviews.Title: USELESS
Reviews.Author: tedward
Reviews.Content: The screen parted from body as I tried to get protective package cover off. Cracked the screen and unit went dead!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: C. Kulik
Reviews.Content: For the price, I find the Zeepad very good.  The only thing I don't get is how to take a picture when there is no viewing hole in the back.  The only picture you can take is of yourself!  I would like it if the battery lasted more than an hour, but all in all, I think it is a good buy for what I use it for.  I have downloaded games (It comes with Angry Birds) and books.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Lmmbee
Reviews.Content: When the tablet arrived it was extremely slow and was not compatible with many of the apps I wanted. I was told to restore it, that didn't work and then I was told to go to a website to go and do another update. After all of that it still didn't run anything.

Reviews.Title: poor battery
Reviews.Author: Tish McCracken
Reviews.Content: very poor battery life!! would not connect to wifi!,often locked while in use. cute and lite weight,loaded apps easily. returned it.

Reviews.Title: Little tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Carrasquillo "lizriver"
Reviews.Content: The plastic is a bit cheap, even for the price. Still my kids like it.  Was very disappointed you can't charge overnight.

Reviews.Title: Flemsy
Reviews.Author: Vegasguy
Reviews.Content: Don't let this thing get handled incorrectly or for that matter broken, because it wont be able to get fixed stateside and the wait roundtrip is way to long.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: TONYA STANTON
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a late Christmas gift for my son. The reviews were pretty good, and I have never had to return anything I purchased from Amazon.com. My son received this tablet at the end of January. On the outside of the box was written Tablet PC, MID Android, nothing about a Zeepad 7.0 Allwinner like the online description stated. The invoice was from a totally different vendor (from China DanDan Wu, pandawill.com) than who I ordered it from HD-Design. After about three months the device stopped charging and is no longer working. I expected my son to have this device longer than three months. Do not buy this item!

Reviews.Title: Broken :(
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Nordstrom
Reviews.Content: My daughter was super excited to receive this and she had it not even a month it was in a case it dropped the screen still broke.  I have had multiple electronics and they have dropped never broke.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sharon R
Reviews.Content: I received this on time.  I really like it but it's a little slow when using wi-fi/internet.  I love the color and the size.  It fits it my purse. It works great with the keyboard/case that I bought along with it.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I am highly disappointed with this product. I ordered it for my son's 8th birthday and I'm upset that the device did not function properly and now he has to go without his gift until I receive a refund.I gave this 1 star because it arrived on time and that's about all it did right. I received it on Tuesday, as scheduled and I charged it for an hour. I had trouble turning the device on but after holding it down for a minute it came on. I connected my Wi-Fi and went to the Google Play store to set up an account. As I was selecting a password the tablet started malfunctioning and random letters started popping up. I didn't have a change to put a password in because the tablet was randomly inputting letters. After a few minutes I shut it down and tried again. Then I was able to make a password and add some apps I know my son would like. I properly shut the tablet down and my son was anxious to play it on his birthday. But when his big day came the tablet WOULD NOT TURN ON! I tried charging it with the charger and on my laptop but even charging it did not help. I held the on/off button for 3 minutes and still nothing. I am so disappointed with this product and will never purchase from this seller again!! When my refund is honored, I'll just shell out the extra bucks and get my son a Nabi tablet or a Kindle Fire. I see cheap is not the right route.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Blaine
Reviews.Content: great product for my 3 yr old grandson he loves it and plays angry birds all the time, it stands up to his roughness. love the product

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend !!
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 Zeepads at the same time and neither of them lasted 2 months!! I will not buy one again!!

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia L. Billingslea
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our 8 year old for her birthday and am very pleased with it.  Very affordable and works great!

Reviews.Title: Defective after 1 use
Reviews.Author: Bshaw
Reviews.Content: The apps that I was able to load were decent. Unfortunately after downloading and turning off the zeepad overnight, it would not turn on the next morning. Also, the screen would not rotate correctly, so it was on the verge of breaking down anyway. The battery drained very quickly also.

Reviews.Title: read the comments under" Can't review something that I haven't received"
Reviews.Author: e.olds
Reviews.Content: Read all the comments under the review titled "Can't review something that I haven't received". Those are the real reviews, these positive stars are not. I cant believe just anyone can write a review here. That is scandalous.The bias party is deleting negative comments. Is you can write a comment with 1 star of what you read for yourself, consumers need to know this is a scam!

Reviews.Title: It's nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a surprise easter gift for my 6 year old son. When it arrived I rushed to get it set up and download a ton of apps so my son could play with it as soon as he opened it. It was very easy to use although the downloading did take a while. Took approximately 10-15 mins to down load each app and I had purchased about 60 apps (along with some children's kindle books). This was fine since the tablet is priced under $100 (what did I expect, really).My sole issue with this tablet is with the charger. It does not charge well or quickly with the USB cord and the wall charger is difficult to work with. The charger plug does not fit completely into the port so I'm constantly trying to stop myself from shoving it in further. Also, if the plug is not positioned in the port exactly right the unit will not charge. I end up twisting and turning, and wiggling the plug around while constantly checking to see if the tablet is indeed charging. It's a little annoying.
