Reviews.Content: Great price. works well. bought 2 for christmas gifts for my grandchildren (ages 4 and 7). they have not put them down. We got the "best" gift award from them both. would suggest getting protective case.

Reviews.Title: gift for my son
Reviews.Author: charity
Reviews.Content: He really loves it. He takes it everywhere we go. It also seems very sturdy. Not very thin like other tablets. It also came with ear buds a stylus and data cable and extra screen protector.

Reviews.Title: I am happy
Reviews.Author: J. Ford
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about ordering since this was a Christmas present for my great grandson aged 4.  I was afraid it wouldn't arrive on time for his visit with me.  The tablet arrived on the day promised and was a wonderful gift.  (I had time to set it up so he could begin enjoying it as soon as he received it).  I would recommend this seller and won't hesitate to use them in the future.

Reviews.Title: touch pad
Reviews.Author: Richard Eagleston
Reviews.Content: This was an inexpensive way to get my granddaughter introduced to a touch pad. It works perfectly and does everything an introductory pad should.

Reviews.Title: First review below...NEW REVIEW...AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was my original review below...I am going to let you all know that these tablets are JUNK!!!! Both stopped charging after two months...one of the chargers literally SHREDDED exposing all the wires. The power button would stick on both tablets, not allowing you to turn on or off. Thank goodness I always purchase the SQUARETRADE warranty because I would be out of money!! I called SQUARETRADE to see about coverage.... this product would have normally been covered under the manufacturer given the timeframe, BUT since this is made in China and it's based out of there...they were nice enough to let me return the product to them, get my amazon gift cards and be done with these ZEEPADS!!!! Now on to finding a better quality tablet for my girls!!!We purchased two tablets for our 4 & 5 y/o girls. They play on my android phone and ipods continuously. These tablets are PERFECT for the game play and NETFLIX that they enjoy on a regular basis. I am very pleased so far with the quality for the price. I plan on purchasing one for myself in the coming weeks

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Terrie Phoenix
Reviews.Content: It was a Chrismas gift for some children. They are so happy, they're sleeping with the tablets. Now I need to purchase one. They won't share with me.

Reviews.Title: peice of crap
Reviews.Author: glc
Reviews.Content: bought it as a gift for my niece's birthday. got 'stuck' in shipping and came a MONTH AFTER her birthday. then froze up and stopped working two months later!never again.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: this one tablet was great. everything worked and my daughter loved it. thank you it was a great gift thanks again

Reviews.Title: Defective/Damaged Upon Opening
Reviews.Author: Madison
Reviews.Content: Was bought for a Christmas gift, and was malfunctioning immediately upon first use, and then just got worse. The screen is malfunctioning to the point it will not acknowledge when you click on something, and scrolls violently even when you are not touching the screen. Would not buy from this seller again. EVER. Bought the 7" inch Dual-Camera version, and will definitely be looking to return it.

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves her Zeepad!!
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: it has netflix and snapchat...the only thing she can't get is SubWay Surfers but other than that she loves it!

Reviews.Title: A GREAT BUY AND GOOD GIFT!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Y.
Reviews.Content: Purchase 4 of these as Christmas gifts.  My Grandchildren loved them.  We charged them prior to giving them out, and once the wrapping was undone, the kids did not put them down.  It was as though they were the only gift they received.  These zeepads were the best thing I could have chosen!  They are good for all ages ranging from child to adult.  I'm thinking of purchasing one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Fully recommended, excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: morivic perdomo
Reviews.Content: excellent product for my son, it is fast, very good picture, if we compare price and quality is an option maginifica actually buy two more.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Iwona Zrodlo
Reviews.Content: it is a good tablet for biggniners for kids becouse it is easy to operate and my kids like it

Reviews.Title: CAMERA DOESNT WORK WITH APPLICATIONS!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kim
Reviews.Content: When we try to video using skype or oovoo, his camera doesnt work. It works fine when using it for regular pics and videos but when we try to use it for the applications, the applications dont recognize that the device has a camera! We tried every setting and option but for some reason, the camera on the device is unrecognized.Though we can still talk, this is quite annoying since the main reason why I got this for him is to be able to see him...Other than that it works fine. If anyone has any solutions to help with my problem, please help.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Taramatee Cindy Bhukal
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from Amazon and it arrived today.  I checked it and the camera is not working properly.  It comes on but you cannot get to take a photo.  The video icon is also sticking.  This part of the tablet is sticking and i'm wondering what it is really working.  It is slow. I am not pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandsons.  The produce allows them the game experience as well as watching T.V.  It is easy to use and great in the car.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more and get a good tablet
Reviews.Author: ESTEBAN MORENO
Reviews.Content: The display broke after a few days. I don't know why. The battery didn't  last very long, like two hours.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, recommended.

Reviews.Content: The price appeared to me excellent, although it is not a recognized brand of tablet but is very well built, has been charged with good applications and games and dferencia other also brings the playstore and good accessories. It was received in perfect condition thanks to that it was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: evelyn
Reviews.Content: what an awesome tablet for the money.  Does more than I expected. GREAT BUY FOR THE KIDS OR TEENAGERS OR GRAMMA.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: valerie armstrong
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet so far no complaints. Runs fast hasn't locked up once. Good quality product. Cameras take decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Cheap tablet....break easy....not worth the time and money

Reviews.Content: I looked a relatively descent tablet...I bought it for my niece and mail it. However, the screen and monitor become blurry after 2-3 weeks....thought to return it and get a new one...but not worth the time...quality is poor...better to get a more expensive that last

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the money

Reviews.Content: Has a few glitches and sometimes is pretty slow but for the price, this isn't a bad buy at all.

Reviews.Title: 7"Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon C. Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter is very happy with her Zeepad purchased through Amazon. She lives on it. It does pretty much what the expensive tablets do. Its really a great buy. If I didnt already have a tablet, I would buy it for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good product! but i cant find a case please help
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I love the wopd 8!!!! Its huge!! Bigger than i thought!! But if anyone can find out where to get a case for this product plese tell me.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Fanny Torres
Reviews.Content: Broke after only 1 week of use, the battery would die after only 1 hour of use. Terrible product. Unhappy

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this one.
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Came with JellyBean 4.1.1 installed, and unlike previous versions it has no root access. Battery life started out at 2 hours, but since some new batteries improve after a few cycles, I figured I'd give it a chance. 3 days later it won't last 1.5 hours before the low battery warning. Screen is inconsistent, sometimes it's extremely sensitive, and sometimes it just won't register, even with the included pointer.

Reviews.Title: Work fine but having some problems.
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: Well it has been working fine,but charging it becomes the problem where the cord plugs in it,you have to hold it or prop it up so it will take a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Will NEVER buy another Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Butterflykisses1781
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Zeepad and each of them has had a unique issue.  The manufacturer doesn't even have a phone number you can contact for support and there is no one that will service these devices.  This on in particular stopped charging with the provided charging cord 2 days after we got it.  Thank God I purchased a Square Trade Warranty on it so I could get credit to buy a Kindle for my daughter instead.

Reviews.Title: Loved this tablet until it would not charge
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday and he loved it. Now it's three months later it will not charge nor come on.

Reviews.Title: Three and a half
Reviews.Author: valerie mclean
Reviews.Content: It did not have skype on it nor did it have any pre loaded games but over all not to bad. I give it 3.5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great android
Reviews.Author: Eva Simon
Reviews.Content: This tablet really surprised me, its great i don't feel the need to bring my laptop everywhere with me because it practically does all what the laptop can do. However the one problem with the zeepad is that it can't handle too much pressure otherwise it just freezes and then you would have to restart it and the camera well mine worked for like about a month and then it just stopped working really don't know why to this day. But still i would recommend it for adults, kids, grandparents it fun and easy to use too

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Shellz
Reviews.Content: Screen vision is poor.  Browser is slow. The battery run low very fast.  Don't like it at all.  Save your $70 for something better.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Winter Tanner
Reviews.Content: My little cousin loves it. There was no problems. It actually shipped really fast. I would totally recommend it to people who has a little child or anyone that's really young

Reviews.Title: zee tab
Reviews.Author: JERZEE2MATO
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for a kid for the price......came in less than a week....has everything a better model  tab has...

Reviews.Title: bought for a gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: my bf bought this for a gift for his little teen cousin. it was just ok for us because when we got it we tried it out and it was slow but great for a child or teen. she seem to enjoy it when she got her gift.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: adam minnicks
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids' birthdays and the company said they were used but in good condition. They were brand new with nothing touched. They work perfectly for my kids aged 6 and 9. They can play their little games and go on youtube like they were doing with mommy's kindle. Now they don't have to use mommy's or fight over just having one tablet. Wifi works great, and the company sent them right on time. I'm very happy as usual with amazon. I always find a great deal on here.

Reviews.Title: Great for my 8 year old!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my daughter's 1st tablet! It came loaded with some of her favorite games and its super fast for her to download new ones.  It turned right on and connected to our wifi with no problems.

Reviews.Title: It works - Kinda
Reviews.Author: ariona_lie
Reviews.Content: Well where do I start with this thing. I read the review, but they were pretty mixed so I decided to try it myself. Now, when we first got it, we let it charge ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL Night (xmas eve) My daughter was so excited, but - well it wouldnt turn on... FINALLY after another day of charging it turned on. My daughter who was 9 at the time started downloading apps - Youtube, Sugar Crush, Instagram, Angry Birds.... welllll......................skype didnt work too well, You cant see the whole game of sugarcrush - but Pandora and Youtube work just great (as long as its charged) I would next time keep my money and get a better name brand - but I guess now my 3 year old can have it...

Reviews.Title: THIS IS JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!! AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Cb
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. I am going to place 2 more orders. My friends and family will do the same. The tablet is amazing. I recommend it 100%  Thank you for my happiness!! God bless this company!!

Reviews.Title: just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Hunter
Reviews.Content: Zeepad is for my six year old.  It is a great price. It does everything we need it to do. This is our second one even.  Perfect for his age group.  So many features.  This is good for anyone looking for a nice tablet at an affordable price. If I have any negative it would be that battery life is short.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Laura Mae Coker
Reviews.Content: These tablets are at a great price and have so many functions. My grandkids love them! And I like them too!

Reviews.Title: it was defected
Reviews.Author: Norma Mendivil
Reviews.Content: It was defected when i got it so i reterned it and got my money back so thats good .

Reviews.Title: Still trying to get it to work
Reviews.Author: Barry C. Adams
Reviews.Content: This darn tablet is driving me crazy....The main problem is that it tries to type everything it hears......I mean everything.  Of course it is not typing English.  Best I can figure it is attempting to write Chinese.  You just constantly get a bunch of symbols.  It is impossible to use it much less teach someone how to use it because of that constant interruption from it typing on its own.  My computer tech has it now.........he may be able to get rid of the voice command problem but it is going to cost me........I figured out how to turn it off......but it keeps turning itself back on...........tried putting a piece of tape over the microphone............didn't help.  As far as directions / operating instructions..................horrible.................definitely a poor Chinese translation with conflicting instructions and false info.JUST WANTED THIS FOR MY MOTHER TO PLAY WORDS WITH FRIENDS WITH ME AS HER IPHONE IS TOO TINY FOR HER TO SEE....................THIS WoPad IS ........SoBad...........she can not even use it.............shoulda got her the Kindle HD.  at least Amazon has some support and can help get it running..............but hey, its a pretty pink.........paperweight.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the cost!
Reviews.Author: hartbach
Reviews.Content: I cannot claim total perfection for this product, but it is perfect for the cost. I have not found the flaws I read about while researching this. It seems well constructed, feels just right in the hands. Granted I have only owned it an hour (o:  If defects show up I will update.Pros:CostSizeEase of useAll attachments fit snugCons:Yes, it is slower than other tablets. Not so bad to make it a no goWill not Flash Play unkess you down load Firefox......that is easy though.

You can only charge it for an hour, it works for about two hours on the battery and you can not use the adapter to  run it only battery powered.

Reviews.Title: good at first
Reviews.Author: dana
Reviews.Content: It was working amazing at first now it is very slow and often closes down my apps and occasionally completely shuts itself off.

Reviews.Title: whew finally my samsung chromebook and Sasmsung galaxy tablet are free from the messy hands

Very handy when they travelled. Small little piece but with price you cant go wrong .Airplane mode was a bit dodgy

Reviews.Content: this was a gift for our niece that is going to college. she absolutely loves it. she purchased an additional case with built in keyboard and has become a very practical tool for her.

Reviews.Title: Good for kids

Reviews.Content: Its alright A little slow My granddaughter uses it. Not for any major use. Why do I have to have a limit on my words.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my twins

Reviews.Content: it does everything it needs to for my 7 yr old twins. Very easy to operate and very durable. They love it.. Would only recommend for children

Reviews.Title: My zeepad

Reviews.Title: It's ok

Reviews.Content: all of them broke within 1 month of buying the product. The charger broke it was a waste of money. I tried to contact them they will not refund back the money or take back their product because it is worthless keeping.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0

Reviews.Title: Its very nice and lite!
Reviews.Author: blackqueen
Reviews.Content: Am still exploring my tablet when my daughter gives me the chance to use it. But I like it very much am thinking about getting one for her so I could have mine to myself!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: twirl6785
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my niece almost two months ago. She loves it! Durable, fast, and great for children. Great product, awesome price, and fast shipping. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jollie Williams
Reviews.Content: Great for kids! Would recommend first before spending big dollars on IPad products.Picture quality not the best but loads apps in a snap.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed kids at Christmas :(

Reviews.Content: Do not buy from "engine29". This product had big problems right away which would have been frustrating, but ok if the seller had any concept of customer service. They ignored multiple emails, and when they did email back gave short answers that didn't solve anything. Don't waste your money. Now I'm stuck with a broken Zeepad and a disappointed 5 and 8 year old.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on purchase
Reviews.Author: simona brooks
Reviews.Content: i have receive tablet and the descripation fits my purchase as i am ready to order more of the same.Enjoying

Reviews.Title: SAVE YOUR MONEY DONT BUY

Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet a while ago and its a piece of junk. the processor is too slow to run games and freezes constantly. both cameras are suckish and the plastic housing feels like they bought the material at dollar tree. so buyers beware, if u want a better faster device, save up money for an ipad mini or nexus 7

Reviews.Title: BROKEN SHIPING ..
Reviews.Author: Zariyah N.
Reviews.Content: IT BROKE AS SOON AS I GOT IT I WAS SO UP SET WHEN U TRYED TO SHIP IT BACK I COULDNT REACH U GUYS TO TELL U THAT I WAS ON VACATION  .................

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in January and have had problems with it since I got it. First off I couldn't get the app store to work, so added Amazons app store and got good results. Then when adding an anti-virus program to the tablet I found out that it had been used before I received it, and could not clear out that persons info. So it wasn't safe to use on sites where I wanted to purchase anything for fear someone could get my info. And because I found all this out after the 30 warranty period I was stuck with it. And now to top it off, I am unable to charge the tablet with either the plug or the cord. This product is just a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Denise Clance
Reviews.Content: We purchased 4 tablets for Christmas for our grandchildren. Have been disappointed with this product of zeepad. They have had problems with pads every since we purchased them....

Reviews.Title: not bad for price
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: Its a great learning tool and starter tablet for my son. We use it for his learning games and for abc mouse.

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: josienj
Reviews.Content: This zeepad is the right size for my my six year ols. It was purchased as a birthday gift. A perfect escape from him always needing my phone to play games and read things on. Great Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Cressie Fraiser "Cressie Fraiser"
Reviews.Content: It is a nice Android for a teenager but I wanted a little bit more for my husband.A very nice pad.

Reviews.Title: just in time for christmas
Reviews.Author: lajune hallman
Reviews.Content: My 17 year old daughter loves the zeepad. Just as described and is perfect for games apps or internet surfing. Awesome buy for the price

Reviews.Title: It was great, while it lasted
Reviews.Author: J. Grunenberg
Reviews.Content: Synopsis: A cheap tablet, with all that entails.I was looking for a cheap tablet. I wasn't sure I'd like, or need a tablet and didn't want to spend a lot of money trying to find out.I purchased the Zeepad in January. It had ok reviews, and the price was good.The good:CheapWorked fine for the games installed.Worked with Google PlayWorked as a decent, but not great, e-reader.No problems with connecting to Wi-Fi or using the SD card.The bad:The charger was bad out of the box. (Luckily charged through the USB slot).It bricked just past 6 months. (It wasn't rooted, and only had a handful of apps installed.)Slow and would lag on internet.Took time to render pdf pages.Not much information on how to unbrick online.Would I get another one? No. Was I happy with it while it worked? Mostly. I was mainly using it as a reader and even though it would lag rendering pages, it worked for what I needed. It never lagged during any of the simple games (Fruit Ninja/Angry Birds), but would bog down on youtube and other internet things.I'm now looking to replace it with a first generation Nexus tablet, or something similar. If I can unbrick it, I'll put it into the hands of the kids, but if not I didn't spend a fortune on finding out that yep, I did want a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Ayanna Wickham
Reviews.Content: This is a cool tablet for my daughter. Very neat. Comes with all the features needed by a young child.

Reviews.Title: good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 8 year old son and so far its been good for what he uses it for (games mostly) and its been durable surviving my other 3 sons as well! haha My 17 year old daughter liked it too and bought one for herself and so far no complaints from any of them!

Reviews.Title: affordable
Reviews.Author: Vw "tech geek"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who  loves to read. We  didn't use it a lot in the beginning and that was a mistake because we didn't notice that it was defective. The ZEEPAD  wouldn't turn on. We made sure that it was charged but it just wouldn't turn on. I contacted the manufacturer and returned the item. We had to pay for the shipping because it was past the three month guarantee. They sent us a brand new one right away. This is a very safe investment for the price. I am addicted to Amazon because they have excellent customer service. Just be sure to check your pad right away to make sure it works.

Reviews.Title: Why did I buy a Zeepad?
Reviews.Author: On Time
Reviews.Content: If you want a tablet that you can actually do something on, don't buy something cheap. The zeepad is slow and it's annoying how badly it's reaction time is. It's a terrible product.

Reviews.Title: worth what I paid for it
Reviews.Author: Anita M. Reyes
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my 8 yr old. She loves it. Comes with a few games already. She has no trouble accessing all its features.

Reviews.Title: Just stopped working
Reviews.Author: Katherine Harder
Reviews.Content: Without trauma or exposure to moisture, it just wouldn't turn on today. Worthless product if the lifespan is only 6 months. I'm glad I didn't store anything important on it, or I would be livid.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Renee Wilson
Reviews.Content: lasted four months thats it slowly stopped charging then went to charge it and it wont turn on bought this for my daughters birthdaywhat a let down

Reviews.Title: It and miss
Reviews.Author: A. C. Pyle
Reviews.Content: I have bought 2 of these Zeepad tablets and 3 other off brand tablets since May. It seems they all either work great or not at all.  This review is specially for the Zeepads.  The first one worked so great (the best one of the 5) that within 2 weeks I bought a second one, the second one is horrible, screen is fuzzy, runs much slower than the first, most of all the wifi will not turn on at all.  When you slide wifi to "on" it automatically turns itself back to "off"  I have tried everything suggestion I can come up with:  try at McDonalds, reset router, clear cache, factory reset, the list goes on.

Reviews.Title: Is very slow, Discharge after half hour
Reviews.Author: Micoman "Micoman"
Reviews.Content: I charge all night, and in mornig I use half hour and discharge, I try charging again and .. work 20 minutes - 30 minutes and turn off. The screen is not very clear.

Reviews.Title: You will LOVE it,!  (HIDE IT!)
Reviews.Author: Raggmopp51
Reviews.Content: This is so great.....Very good to have...I have a Google tablet,but this is great...All my grand kids were down in June... I could do everything with this,especially watch the movies....Kept the Little ones quiet,and Papa also got to watch HIS TV!!! Well, they now  have gone back home...all but.My Oldest Grandson (14) is staying for 2 more weeks! he has been using the older table which I gave him, ,but he kept grabbing my Zeepad on me! .. He said "NANA,.I love the Graphics and how fast it looks up what I need!...My grandson came to me the other evening ,and said,"Nana, I really like this Zeepad,it is so much better !!! I love watching movies on it, and playing my games."..I knew what was coming!....Guess who has got  the ZEEPAD?...It is going back too Indiana!! I will have to buy another one!  PS...You got grandkids coming???, take my advice and HIDE it! So glad I bought it! "When my Grand kids are happy, I'M HAPPY!!! (They live 800 miles from us)  THANKS AMAZON!  very satisfied with my purchase,,,,you will be getting another order from me soon!

Reviews.Title: ZeePad - Junk
Reviews.Author: Badabing
Reviews.Content: Had hopes for this $70 tablet.  It came with a keyboard (Bluetooth not supported) as part of the folding case, along with 3 styluses.  I added 8 GB of memory. The tablet kept rebooting.  It would not download apps from the Playstore.  The Browser would start to open and then crash.  No GPS either. Totally useless piece of junk.  Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Ive had this a few months now
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I like this little tablet. Ive had this a few months now and I must say i like it. I read my newspaper on the the subway to work . I read Kindle Books with the kindle app which is great. I also use Google play extensively. I also have the option of using Amazon Apps. Its extremly light the swipe keyboard which makes it fast and easy is availible on Google play. I started with a 2gb micro card but the  more GB you add the faster is moves and less lag time. It takes one minute to boot up.  The camerea is trash but its OK for Skype ....just OK. Hardly a sell or take away point. I dropped it once and its so easy to actually put back together as long as your pieces don't breakn  This was a great find, especilly if you are careless or a teen. I keep thinking I want to get a dedicated Kindle reader but I cant justify it this really takes care of my needs. The Red color makes it look young and sporty

Reviews.Title: Cute tablet for kids, but...
Reviews.Author: Christina Fisher-Williams
Reviews.Content: Cute tablet for kids but extremely delicate. Screen cracks very easily! This is the second Zeepad I've purchased in six months ( the first one was from Sears). Having difficulty contacting the seller to arrange to replace the screen at my cost.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Lil_Kitten7
Reviews.Content: This was ordered for my Granddaughter and it is very nice she said and works great ! She got the pink keyboard case to go with it and they work awesome together !

Reviews.Title: This thing is Great
Reviews.Author: tiffany
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what we wanted and it is great, in fact we are going to purchase two more. Get the ones with Android and you dont have to worry about Viruses, that is why we got it

Reviews.Author: Broderick
Reviews.Content: Items are not bad as far as the tablets, it's not a bad tablet. I have more of a beef with the seller due to items that were promised were not in the box I received. I'm missing stylus for both of my tablets and the promised screen protectors.Seller has to do better!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: StanF
Reviews.Content: Excellent delivery time.  Very easy to set up to WIFI, simple to navigate & quite rapid on respond time for just the rather small RAM.  I haven't tried the cams yet tho as I very recently received it

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for 8 year old Girl
Reviews.Author: Sue-Anne Orozco
Reviews.Content: Very good gift... We purchased the Zeepad for our 8 year old daughters birthday back mid May of this year and she loves it... It's been an awesome starter tablet.. You can download just about anything from the android appstore and very easy to use... She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Chad M. "Chad"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something inexpensive for my 5 year old, he is too advanced for the normal "kid" tablets, meaning he is used to navigating android phones and other tablets.  I have only had it 2 days but so far its exactly what i need.  His last one was a bit more expensive, and even with a screen protector and a big case, he broke it.  So far this tablet is better than that one, meaning faster and able to handle movies without having to change the file type etc...and if it breaks, its 1/3 of the cost of most other tablets, plus his favorite color is red so that added to the excitement.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Zuhair Baker
Reviews.Content: For a tablet that cost about $80 it is great slow but for your kids it is what you should get them they can play watch and it has all Android stuff.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Bryan "hydrophoid"
Reviews.Content: No one is going to love working on this tablet, but at the price point I hope no one is expecting to work on this tablet (you could do some work with it but you would not like it).Overall this is a great tablet for the price. My wife and I debated getting our 4 year old a LeapPad for educational games, but I was able to win out by pointing out the cost of many Android games: free.The screen has a small viewing angle and the resolution isn't the best, my daughter loves playing the ABC and puzzle games we downloaded for her. I have not purchased any software for her, but the free games on Play are awesome. This thing even runs Candy Crush (just in case you were wondering :).I wish this didn't have a proprietary charging end on it (it has a USB port, but that is not for charging) but my other tablets also have proprietary charging ports so it seems to be standard for them to make a different port.The box was full of goodies: charging cable, usb adapter (so you can plug in full sized usb items to the tablet), a stylus, AND a screen protector. They really delivered on the packaging.This tablet is really a bargain for the price, it wont win any processor speed awards and it can hang at times but if you are in the same boat and looking for something to entertain your children during long drives or you want to use some type of electronic game/learning system this is priced to be in your top 5 list of purchase considerations. On the other hand, if you are an adult looking for something to surf the web/look for jobs/ do any type of professional work with, I would suggest a different more powerful (and likely expensive) tablet.Willie-B

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JT"
Reviews.Content: This is great for my grandson with downs syndrome. He broke the glass and they even repaired it for $20.00

Reviews.Title: Teenage daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: MommaFoo
Reviews.Content: My daughter especially loves the front-facing camera and uses it to Skype with her friends.  Does the same and more as my Kindle.  She's had it a few weeks now and so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Was the quality of this item above or below your expectations
Reviews.Author: María Eusebia Díaz Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is brand is not offered in the notice, did not bring security, did not bring the manual or the bonus offered in the bid. All this calls into question its quality and durability.

Reviews.Title: Great Kids Tablet, Okay Quality, Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought four (yes, 4) of these for my kids for Christmas 2012. So they have been through more than six months of regular use. For $70 these are pretty good. They are definitely not iPads, Google Nexus, or Samsung Galaxies, but they are a good buy for your average 4 to 8 year olds. At this point, three of the four are still working and two of the four are working well. They work well for playing games, reading ebooks, watching movies, or taking silly (albeit low quality) pictures of oneself. They do all this just as well a Nexus.About two months ago one the tablets stopped charging, the battery still had a small charge (not enough to power up) and the charger was working. Something stopped working in the charging circuits on the motherboard. So that one is no longer usable.All but one of the chargers has stopped working, I think the wire or plug is too weak and broke, they worked if you wiggled the plug. Also the charging receptacle in the tablets is weak, one tablet's does not work anymore. And the USB port of another does not work. This has probably as much to do with the kids jamming and yanking on the cord, as anything.Fortunately, the USB connector does charge the tablet, so even without any of the chargers you can still use the tablets.The third tablet is very slow to react when tapping on the screen. This is most noticeable on the home screen, but also when playing games, though not as bad.Very odd, seems more of a software based problem than hardware.The fourth tablet, so far (knock on wood) is working fine no problems at all. Battery life has never been that great, two hours or so max. It hasn't diminished in six months so they are good quality, just not that big. Keep a smart phone charger on hand and they will last as long as you've got gas in the car.Overall, I am pleased with these tablet. Especially for younger kids, when you don't want to throw a lot of money down the drain (literally!) Trust me, I know, before they got these, my wife's Nexus, ended up in the toilet when two kids tried to grab it at the same time. Fortunately, it still works fine.We know they can take care of them now, so we will upgrade them one at a time, as they stop working. So far only one has had to be replaced. Pretty good as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: No problems

Reviews.Content: I had to buy a new one becuse my old one fell down the basement stairs the screen didn't crack nothing broke but the power button what I find odd is when I got my new one it came with the USB cord and a good charger but my old one just came with a USB cord that plugs in to a wall charger I only baought the one that broke three months ago before buying a new one with the old one I chould only charge it with a USB cord that connects to a wall charger and the USB port was starting to become worn out so they must have changed it were they send you a good charger and the USB cord separately with the pad I love the new one and its small enough to put in my cargo pants side pocket iam thinking about buying one for my brother seeing how its durable to a limit it whould be great for a kids first tablet I think I'll be more carefull with the new one lol

It was a gift for my son and since I ordered it ahead of time, the return date was his actual birthday.  I was hesitant to buy electronics on amazon and now I have learned my lesson.  :(

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Meg C.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: 57donn

Reviews.Title: Only lasted less than a month
Reviews.Author: ldb3
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old daughter. It was a good tablet for a 7 year old. Able to download apps, upload her favorite music, watch her cartoons. Till one day the screen just popped off and once I snapped it back on it just wouldn't turn back on. Returned it back to Amazon, no exchange just refund. Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. When it works I would give it Four and half stars, but poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: slow  to touchy w/ stylist too  short battery life  when strowing it enlarges way to easy  maybe 10yrs will like it

Reviews.Title: Two out of Three broke in less than Three Months and NO support
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Holland Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids for Christmas - seemed like a cheap alternative to see if they would like this type of thing.They worked great at first, but within a week one charger burned out, then another so they were sharing the third charger or using the alternate usb charging.Then 2 of the 3 stopped taking a charge all together.  Terrible construction on this product.And the service was worse - they first offered to sell me 2 new chargers at the same price I could just order them from amazon and then offered to fix the pads IF I paid for the fix because it was past 30 days - shortest warrantee I ever heard of...Do yourself a favor and splurge for the ASUS or Nexus right out of the gate.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Brenda

Reviews.Title: ashley

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: nikkih
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my seven year old son for his birthday. I did not want to put a lot of money in it being I was afraid that he will drop it. After reading reviews after reviews I bought it. This is perfect for him. I have not had any problems with it freezing up. While he has an account for g.c. to buy games there are plenty of free games and books.  The stylus has already torn. It has a rubber bottom that is used on the screen and it has come apart. No big deal use your fingers. There are no set parental controls on it, but my husband went on google and manually set controls for graphic material. So you can set controls it just takes a bit to do. THe battery isn't as long as an Ipad or other high end tablets, but that is a positive in my book. It usually last a good hr to hour and half of active use.  Overall I believe this is a good buy for a kid to have a tablet. If he breaks it I feel like I don't have a ton of money in it.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: Danger
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids

Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!

Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Title: does even work

Reviews.Title: great product!

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Cute little Zeepad gadget!
Reviews.Author: Jannie Annie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a reader for my granddaughter. I decided to test it out before giving it to her. I have to say I am quite impressed with it. It worked great right out of the box. I followed the directions and charged it 2 1/2 hours before using it. It is so cute in pink. The graphics are nice and the speed is good. It has some handy pre-loaded aps such as Facebook, Google and fun games I know she will like such as Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja. It is so much more than a reader. I've only had it a couple of days and it has an ap for the reader but I haven't had time to test that yet. It completes with much more expensive tablets so I have to say so far I'm very happy with this purchase and you certainly get much more than your monies worth!!!!

Reviews.Title: Best for games, not for internet surfing
Reviews.Author: Pete Sakes
Reviews.Content: My Android cellphone with budget service (Boost) has an easier time loading webpages than the zeepad running off of wifi.I bought this for my daughter, however, and it is for her to download and play android app games, not surf the web, and it is great for playing games. I have had a few freezes, but only while trying to visit webpages, none yet during game play. I will update if anything goes completely kablooey with it. I'm pleased with what I paid for it, as it works for its intended purpose. Had I bought it for personal use, I would be very, very disappointed. I purchased a GTAB Nero by Matricom for myself and had to return it. It was practically dead on arrival. Now I've purchased a (slightly) more expensive iRULU 9 inch for personal use. I haven't received it yet, so we shall see...

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: IMPORTANT RUN AVG OR SOME ANTIVIRUS AS SOON AS U GET TABLETThe tablet comes installed with games and 2 of the games came up as potentially threatening so if u just hand it to your kid and they try to play those games u are at risk I use avg pro its still$15 bucks but I have it installed on 4 devices so worth the money u can get it in the play store this tablet is awesome but an adult should go thru all the settings and run spywear b4 handing it over to kids as I said in my updates whoever rooted the device changed the settings if u run avg it will walk u thru the settings at the end of the scan to protect your deviceI bought this tablet for my 18 month old daughter because she is determined to keep up with her older brothers and loves all the learning apps available for young toddlers I must say this tablet is great for her im going to try to find a kid tuff case of course the tablet is on the cheaper side I only paid 76 bucks im not complaining all the apps work and this tab has options to delete installed apps and options to move apps to sd card I did not have those options on my galaxy so not bad at all shes gonna be so excited to play her word games when she wakes up from naptimeUpdateJust realized this tab comes rooted I know this is a high selling point for some it makes me a little nervous but so far so good I will update again if anything else pops upUpdateSo my daughter loves it the abc phonics games are a must for anyone with young toddlers the zeepad is definatly great so far of course the speakers suck and itscheap plastic its only $76 bucks I recommend going thru the settings whoever rooted it set those kind of weird still tweaking them my daughter doesnt want to let go of the thing its great for kids and budgets I cnt afford an ipad and if I could im not handing It to my child so this is a great way for u to let your youngster play without losing out on $500 or more if they drop itUpdateDay 2 with the zeepad the charger works its battery life definatly isnt great and it depletes even when your not using the tablet but I also believe those small annoyances to be the reason the zeepad is available for such a cheap price its a wonderful beginner tablet for young kids it comes already installed with kids games and is obviously intended for kids but as I said before if your on a budget an adult could find this useful also its not the fastest or the best thats why its so cheap but its still more than enough for my daughter to watch her shows and play her apps I would definatly recommend this tablet to others great purchaseUpdateThe tablet is still working despite the fact my 18 month old has been drooling and pushing on the screen a little harder than I like then again I bought her the zeepad so she wouldnt abuse my galaxy anymore so I guess I shouldnt complain reading the reviews are what helped me make my purchase and they are also how I determine what seller to purchase from that is ehy I keep updating I feel like this tablet is a good deal if u purchase from a reliable seller and supervise your kids charge it for them its not a tank they can still break it make them sit on the couch while they play it instead of running with it this tablet is cheap and has tons of features but its not durable or it would cost more if u want durable spend $100 more bucks and u will get higher quality this is a great beginner tablet its still quite fast for a single core processor and has tons of features runs netflix youtube and my comcast apps all fine on comcast I have to log out then back in somtimes for it to work but for it $76 delivered its not that big of a deal plus u can install apps that require root access my tablet doesnt do that and to buy higher end rooted tablets is at least $100 more on top of what the going price is so im assuming the negative reviews are the people who bought from the seller at the very bottom offering the dual camera on the probably fake zeepadsUpdateIts been a couple weeks now the zeepad is still charging and works great I only charge it about once a week but I also shut it off when my daughter isnt playing it I think this was a great deal my daughter loves it and it plays all her movies and games without any problemsUpdateThe zeepad is still working just got done loading a bunch of free mp3 songs for my daughter off of the free app I got off google play I really dnt understand all the bad ratings for my$76 bucks this is an amazing deal we have 3 samsung galaxy tab2 also and this tablet does just as much a little slower at times and not as good quality but for the price this is a great dealUpdateSkype works and all of the other apps we have loaded on here just got done reading elmo and dora ebooks we downloaded on the kindle app I still cnt figure out why people dnt like this tablet I'm writing my review on it rn the battery isn't that bad and why would u want your child playing 5hrs of games a day anyways either way zeepad still works and we still love it

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD, SELLER DracoTek Please Read
Reviews.Author: Damita J Pannell
Reviews.Content: I had to contact the seller because the shipping address was incorrect. I chatted with Amazon and they sent a request to Draco Tek. I also sent an email to Drack Tek and they responded within 48 hours...I was impress with the seller and Amazon for helping me correct the shipping address. I purchase this item on March 9,2013 I received this item on March 23, 2013 sooner than promised. I brought this product for my grand-daughter she is 4 years old and is very savvy with my iPad 4. I brought this product for the price and for what it can do. I was some what disappointed because when I received this product everything was their except the stylus pen, the box came with 3 different type of chargers. One was USB, AC adapter and one for using a flash drive. The USB and AC Adapter does not work I tried it and the charge stayed at 1%. So I tried a different USB and it started charging so I left it to charge overnight. I tried it the next day and it did not charge more than 2%. The product request that you charge it the first time 6 hours...so I was disappointed that I still could not use this item. So I tried another charger that I had and this charger was charging I started charging at 9:00am and it was fully charged be 2:00pm.  Finally I was able to see what this could do and so far it works okay. I know folks say this was inexpensive...however you should always receive what the seller is selling and the item should do what the product states it should do no exceptions.  I brought this base on what the product offered. Money should not be a factor...just because some items cost more does not make them a better product. I could send this product back after all if the product cannot work because you cannot charge it then it is no good to you...major flaw. I think Drakco Tec Store which is located in China should read their customers reviews. I did read the reviews and had mixed emotions. Being a buyer at Amazon and trusting Amazon I took a chance. I have purchased a lot on Amazon since March 9,2013 and I'm learning a lot about the sellers and shipping. I what have rated this product higher because it does work and it is a good buy...however not being able to charge this item is very huge for me. Please take the time to read all reviews...their was a lot to read. I read all of the reviews after ordering. So I did know there was a possibility that the charger would not work. So I did gather up all of the old chargers I had collected over the years from old cell phones which save the day...so in the end it did work out. I will do a much shorter review after using the product longer.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew Fong
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and I've been pleased with it. I bought it knowing that it's not a high-end samsung or iPad. Some times it seems to hang a little bit on commands and there seems to be a slight dead spot on one of the corners (which is only a problem if I oriented it that way so that the "back" button is on that corner).If you just want a very inexpensive tablet to fiddle with, like I did, this is a nice product for that.

Reviews.Title: For the price it passes muster
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Now to start off we are not talking a Nexus 10 tablet or an I Pad so if thats what your seeking then this is not for you . First off the good points i observed is it comes preloaded with a couple of games ie: Angry birds and a couple of kids games which is what this is really geared to . I bought this for my 9 yr old nephew knowing full well it was not going to be a top of the line tablet . It accesses the internet on WiFi only no Ethernet port that i observed . It is relatively fast but again we only talking 512 mb ram so your not talking lightening fast . It has a decent camera with it and also a built in microphone , both as i have said are decent for what your paying . Its only really bad downfall is it's battery life . Even fully charged its battery might last you an hour depending on what your doing with it . It seems to use more power using the internet than the games. Possibly because of it being on wireless .i am assuming you will not be able to use this in a wireless hot spot because you do have to set it up to detect your wireless configurations on your device at home . But if your looking for something for the kids to use and don't want to spend 500 bucks or more on an I Pad  then this might serve the need . Just make sure your power cord is readily available .

Reviews.Title: Great for eReader and Web Surfing
Reviews.Author: A. NAVA "PaperPusher"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife's birthday.Sorry not to tech savvy on the unit's particulars but here's what we use it for:Pros: Great eReader Tablet, she uses the local online Library to check out books and is a big plus!Web surfing through our home wireless network works pretty good and watch videos 'netflix', 'youtube' with no problem.Also fun with our newborn son interactive android apps.Battery life is pretty decent (i shut off the unecessary apps).Great price for what this tablet offers!Cons: the camera has a low resolution but ok for starter. The instruction booklet was not really helpful but gave enough hints to figure out some configuration (network, navigation, setting up accounts, etc..)The camera has low resolution pictures come out grainy in medium to low light, have not tried with bright lights.Overall, a great beginner's tablet. Very functional for ereader, websurfing, checking email, and simple apps.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price and if you only want to browse the web.
Reviews.Author: Frederico DosSantos
Reviews.Content: The pad is quite durable; I carry it with me everywhere on my backpack and it gets tossed around quite a lot. A plus is that it comes with a screen protecting sheet(that you have to apply) but its one less thing you need to worry about buying and if you are looking at this guy, you value saving some $$. The plastic cover is quite solid but the edges do scuff up pretty quick. The battery lasts about 2 hours and that is acceptable for the price. If you are thinking about using this as a PC substitute please keep in mind that after the OS you only have about 1.9Gbs of space left; bought a 32Gb microsd from scandisk and the system recognized it right away; but only as a 29.8Gb device(might be file system configuration, but that's enough space for me. It comes with angry birds and fruit ninja installed and it was a great excuse to have some random children play with it and although they handled it as if it was made of solid titanium; it came out with minor scratches, but non on the screen because of the protector.The major down side for this device is the charger; as noted before it doesn't fit all the way and most of the time you have to "giggle" it around so that it will start charing; but the usb cable charges perfectly, just takes longer; I get a full charge from 2% to 100% in about 15 minutes on wall charger and about 23 on usb.I would have given it a 5, had it come with bluetooth or at least gps support. Tried a few bluetooth adapters but was not able to get it to be recognized; but did not do much other than plug it in and wait a minute or two.

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD
Reviews.Author: Michael Stone
Reviews.Content: Basically got the item for the Grand kids, it has performed well, a little slow but for the money it has stood the test, was shipped in a very timely manner, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: 7.0 Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: We got a 7.0 zee pad for our son for his 8th birthday and we love it, very simple and does everything iPod does but 100 dollars cheaper thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Zeepad issues or is it from the seller? But, I do have some positive info too
Reviews.Author: April D Cobb
Reviews.Content: Not sure if all my problems with this tablet is from the unit itself or from the seller I bought it from in Hong Kong. That was my first mistake not reading thoroughly as I usually do and not buying within the United States. The tablet was slow doing anything,the battery life seemed to be short,there is no reset button to try. The settings menu for example looking up battery use you couldn't tell where you stood it says like 40% and then it would die. But, that wasn't the biggest issue as had it for a month and now it's completely dead. Now, if we go with just a bad tablet it happens and or something about the seller and overseas I can't answer about this tablet as it gets rave reviews which is why I bought it. One big positive I can say is the Amazon A-Z Guarantee. Make sure you have it. I asked them to step in when I was only having trouble before totally dying and I believe in less than 24 hrs. it was resolved and I received a full refund.  Another big positive to have on electronics from Amazon is the Square Trade Warranty. It's worth the extra money. I have had to use it in the past on another item and that is also everything you read on reviews. Easy,fast,amazing. Trying to be fair. Give it a try,buy within the United States, purchase Square Trade Warranty and that's my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Died after a months use
Reviews.Author: Theresa2674
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these items for my children for Christmas.  Both had to get shipped back to Engine99 after a months use.  One of them, there is no longer any sound.  The other one, the power button broke and got stuck inside of the unit.  I shipped everything back at my cost (approx $25), to only get a call from them saying that I have to purchase parts for repair and that they are giving me a great deal.  Sorry, but a great deal to me is to fix the unit at no charge at all since it died after 30 days!!  I paid the $20 parts fee.  I also asked what the guarantee is on this "new part" that they are installing.  They informed me that there is no guarantee on it and if it breaks again, I must pay for it again.  I do not recommend this product.  Also, this product went on sale almost half off 20 days after I purchased it.  Fantastic!

I did, and after several emails back and forth (they couldn't find them, needed my tracking number, etc., which thankfully I had and kept), asking the status of the repairs, they finally agreed to send me a refund. They are a great concept, but I honestly cannot recommend them, at least from the company I purchased them from on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad for the kids
Reviews.Author: Zeepad Parents
Reviews.Content: We got two Zeepads for our kids. We have a 5 year old boy and a 10 year old girl. Upon reading other reviews that these might be somewhat fragile, we have drilled into the kids that they need to be gentle with them. In general, these work just like a Droid smart phone and last a couple of hours before they need to be recharged. As we don't really want the kids playing games longer than this, we are fine with the batter life. The Google Play Store works just like on a smartphone and we have had no issues with this or using the wifi. I added a couple of leftover mini SD cards I had from old smart phones to increase the storage space for the kids.The only issues we have had with these tablets have all been in with either the original seller (not Goodios) or the quality control of the product. We originally ordered these 15 days before christmas to be from Santa. These never arrived, Amazon refunded our money and that company is no longer in business. Beware of the folks with the cheapest price. We then re-ordered these from Goodios who have been perfect in solving our problems. Our first set of these arrived and one of them was dead on arrival. It was quickly replaced with another that had a bad charger. We had a new charger within a couple of days and then found out the little USB connector was also defective. They sent us one of those and now everything works fine.We got the little USB keyboards that double as covers which work fine with one exception. When the Zeepad is in the case and the case is turned vertically the Zeepad can slip out of the little claws that hold it in. As these cases are all made the same I will put either double sided tape or some velcro on ours to keep this from happening.We really like these tablets and they kids have been using them up everyday when they get home from school for over a month. If Zeepad improved their quality control we would have had no issues with them at all. The 4 stars are because of this.  But for the price we really can't complain much about that either.

Reviews.Title: review

Reviews.Title: Great 7" Tablet with One Problem
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: I received this Zeepad 7.0 tablet quickly.  It was packaged in China and looked fairly cheap, but all components including two USB adapters were included.  My problem was the stand alone AC  charger.  It didn't work even after 'fiddling' with it.  However, I was knowledgeable enough to know it could be charged with the included adapters via USB.  This is the ONLY way I can charge it, but at least it can be done, and for me is not a problem.  The price is fantastic.  The features are good and it works quite well with the Android 4.0 OS.  Having access to Google Play makes for an endless stream of apps.  The battery holds up very well for maybe 4 hours of hard use, and the standby is very good as well.I asked the merchant for ideas on the AC replacement to no avail.  I didn't even get a response from them.  I'm happy with the unit... just not the merchant's response.  For the money, you will get a very good 7" tablet. It also works well with the keyboard 'clutch' case that plugs into the USB slot.  I highly advise adding this $10+ accessory.
